description: 国内办公地点：上海市 松江区  主要工作内容 1.  负责墨西哥当地低压市场的开拓，完成个人销售指标。 2.  进行客户的日常关系维护，保持与客户的深度联系。 3.  协助市场团队开展墨西哥当地的品牌推广活动。 4.  收集墨西哥市场的竞品信息，竞争对手价格策略和营销策略。  任职要求 1.  优秀22届应届毕业生（本科及以上）。 2.  西班牙语流利，可以进行书面和口语的商务沟通。 3.  可以接受长期在拉美片区出差。 4.  喜欢跨文化沟通的工作氛围，喜欢接受有挑战的工作，喜欢营销类的工作。 5.  优秀的沟通表达能力，适应能力和抗压能力强，结果导向。  岗位发展通道 1.  销售管培生是作为正泰国际海外子公司国际经理候选人进行培养的，会直接参与到专项的“国家经理训练营”中进行集中培训。培养周期预计为2-3年。 2.  岗位的工作内容前期以销售岗位为主，后续会陆续参与到子公司运营的工作中。
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Industrial Automation, and Renewables & Environment

description: Responsibilities  I. Demand Planning Maintain all items in the demand planning framework with the most current information, so that the process is run properly, updated, which includes maintenance of inventory, forecasts. Ensure that demand planning and forecasted level inventory of all products are maintained at predefined policy levels. Identify opportunities for costs reduction. Monitor inventory levels to well support sales by reconciling stocks on monthly basis and report to manager for any foreseeable risk in out of stocks. Coordinate with overseas plants through regular communication to achieve on-time feedback on their supply plan. Track daily importation& logistics activities with supply chain team and follow up logistics projects. Organize monthly demand plan meetings with internal & external teams to align demand forecast according to sales marketing activities. Work with management team to define KPI’s and report on monthly basis.  II. Sales data Analysis Receive and integrate orders from clients and input them into system, ensure the data is accuracy. Track channels` sell-in, sell-out numbers and inventory status, then provide data required to support sales team. Generate the key sales analysis based on different sources, provide ideas for better understanding of both opportunities and threats of the business. Provide sales analysis report to management team on monthly basis and identify status of all items.   Qualification Bachelor Degree Prefer the candidate with working experience in the Perfume/Cosmetics industry as supply chain related. Open to fresh graduate with strong figure sense & excel skill. Excellent communication skills, well-organized, detail-minded with ownership Business oriented & result driven True team player and able to manage multiple tasks Fluent in English and Mandarin.

Large business scope Top Brand  About Our Client  The client is unique existence of a high end skincare brand originated from Europe.  Job Description  Increase distributors's effectiveness and growth by orienting, training and counseling their staff as well as communicating values, strategies, and objectives with them and providing them with opportunities. Accomplish objectives in the region by establishing plans, budgets and results measurements, allocating resources, reviewing progress, making mid-course corrections. Set and oversee brand performance (from a sales growth, market share, margins and profit standpoint) Build company and brand image by collaborating with customers, communities, key influencers (media, socialites etc) to foster and promote "ethical" business practices Maintain continuous cooperation with key function in the office to capitalize their insights and maximize the business impact If necessary to find, assess and highlight to the Regional Director of the brand new potential distributors Oversee the financial part ensuring that margins, profits and credits are fully in line with the Region's targets Develop, train and coach the Distributor's team/staff to not only share with them most effective practices and initiatives but also to build and maintain strong commitment and mutual trust  The Successful Applicant  At least 8 years working experience in Cosmetic/FMCG/Skincare sector with at least 3 years brand management experience with an reputable brand in China Track record on developing and leading a business team to achieve multi-million sales target through distributor and/or other possible sales channels Ability to travel frequently domestically and internationally, when required Fluent in English and Mandarin Ability to expand the business scope throughout various medias and new channels, such as Vlog.  What's On Offer  Potential Growth to Asia Market Competitive salary  Contact: Jim DAI  Quote job ref: 4168907

Job Profile Summary Grade IResponsible for supporting the team to maximise profitability and sales opportunities by managing and developing strategic business relationships for strategically important Key Accounts, building on existing relationships and creating new business opportunities. The scope of the role will influence the grade – this can include financial accountability, geographical scope, leadership responsibilities and overall level of responsibility.  Job Advert Purpose of role  The role is accountable for developing and implementation of sales strategy in selected territory and deliver financial performance targets including Sales Volume, Gross Margin and Overdue. The role is also responsible of finding prospect partners, coaching distributors and monitoring their financial position to ensure long term.  Accountabilities Develop and implement territory business plans according to PU business strategy Deliver financial performance targets for territory including Volume, GM and Overdue Develop, agree (both internally and externally) and implement the annual business plan with the Distributor / Channel partner, providing permanent support in all areas of its contents, including: sales performance including forecasting and reporting – with timely interventions sales capability (skills and knowledge) customer offer deployment, coverage and satisfaction financial Return on Investment and cash flow performance brand representation and compliance HSSE and Ethical compliance Input and influence people resources allocations of the distributors to ensure strategic priorities are fulfilled within the territory Ensure the sales tools and system is effectively implemented by distributors in the area Lead or act as the focal point for the assigned projects in the territory Improve and deliver customer experience in targeted sectors and customer groups. Seeking continuous improvement and efficiency in all operations making sure the voice of the customer is represented in every decision we make. Drive standardization of our sales offers in line with basic customer offer Ensure that all activities conducted through 3rd parties or intermediaries in country comply fully with our own CoC and local competition legalization. Ensure compliance with country regulations, BP Group, Segment and regional policies and standards Education Bachelor degree or above Experience Minimum 5 years working experience in distributor sales and management Track record of delivery of sales targets and performance Experience/track record/confidence representing the company externally and dealing professionally with large distributors Experience of managing negotiations at senior level Skills & Competencies Ability to develop and implement strategic and tactical business plans Ability to be hands on and drive the business with direct responsibility Flexibility of thought and action to be able to respond to changing market environments and dynamic business situations We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. Entity Customers & Products  Job Family Group Sales Group  Relocation available No  Travel Required Yes - up to 75%  Time Type Full time  Country China  About BP CUSTOMER AND PRODUCTS We’re gearing up for the future. At bp our goal for C&P is to deliver the future of mobility, energy and services for our customers by innovating with new business models and service platforms.  C&P will become a hub, housing our midstream, lubricants, aviation, sale of chemicals, mobility and convenience, marketing and our next-generation businesses, making it a highly integrated and interconnected organisation. And with safety being our core value, our commitment to safe and reliable operations will never change.  Want to join the team? This means: being customer-centric, agile and responsive to changing customer needs and dynamic markets focusing on growth and development of customer offers optimising the chemicals and fuels value chains to maximise integrated value contributing to the reduction of carbon intensity of the products we create, and sell, by 50% by 2050 or sooner creating strategic partnerships that drive long-term value for C&P being digitally enabled and empowered by customer insights and data to deliver solutions. Experience Level Intermediate

Job Description  Major Responsibilities/Activities: Work with marketing & sales team to establish bidding strategy and action plan. Manage bidding information and bidding policy analysis. Work with distributor in bidding process. Negotiate with local authority and try to get optimal bidding price. Full supports for local staffs to follow up the whole bidding process and provide feasible action plan to accomplish bidding projects with other related departments. Build and maintain good relationship with professional associations and KOLs. Provide guidance and help for Sales team to get our products listed in key individual hospital. Develop distributor management strategy, establish/implement effective distributor management policy. Establish and implement policy to confront cross zone sales activity, maintain the legitimacy of orders within respectively sales territory. Communicate and lobby with government decision makers in different levels with specific goal. Build up relationship with central governments to ensure corporate business is well protected and fit with government development agenda and direction. Get our newly-launched or licensed products onto national reimbursement list. Lobbying government in new product price application to get optimal price. Establish and build on relationships with key contacts within the company, and govt. agencies. Requirements Industry experiences: Minimum of 6years working in MNC or government office. Familiar with Government Affairs and have relevant exposure and experiences in product bidding, distributor management, reimbursement listing and pricing either in pharmaceutical products or healthcare products. Position experiences: Minimum of 4 years relevant experience in hospital bidding practice. Experience in new drug pricing application and medical reimbursement practice Better to have relevant experience in distributor/wholesaler management for medical products Language Skills： Good command of written and verbal English. Computer Skills: Proficient computer skills in MS Office (Excel & PPT) and Lotus Notes. Mobility: Be flexible to travel as business need Certificate Required: Essential-At least bachelor's degree on pharmaceutical or related major Other Special requirement: Able to work under pressure to meet tight dateline Able to work independently and yet contributed as a team player Good interpersonal communication and coordinating skills Self-motivated, creative and well organized.

SALES REPRESENTATIVE - CHINA SOUTH  A fantastic opportunity to join a fast growing and dynamic spirits company with numerous new product launches planned for the next 18 months. The Crimson Spirits Company is looking to hire a Sales Representative based in China South, ideally Guangzhou or Shenzhen. You will work as part of a small, but dynamic and motivated team, working on driving sales for our in-house brands and products.   JOB RESPONSIBILITIES Contacting potential and existing clients to establish rapport and arrange meetings. Strong focus on clients in Southern China, covering Shenzhen and Guangzhou as key cities. Helping to plan and oversee new marketing initiatives alongside the Shanghai marketing manager Researching bars, restaurants, hotels and distributors to find new business opportunities  Increase the value or current customers while attracting new ones Finding and developing new markets in the China South and boosting sales revenue. Monthly and quarterly sales reports.    CANDIDATE 1-2 years experience in sales, preferably in the Food and Beverage industry  Strong communication skills Ability to manage complex projects and multitask. Be personal and amiable.  Ability to flourish with minimal guidance, be proactive and handle uncertainty Be goal orientated and sales driven Good level of English required  SALARY & BENEFITS Basic salary of 8,000-10,000/month DOE + structured monthly commission  Travel expenses covered   WORK HOURS Monday - Friday 14:00-22:00 (office hours, plus visiting clients)  LOCATION Work remotely, Shenzhen or Guangzhou candidate ideal

Develop and maintain good relationships with KOLs and key procurement depts. 8. Maintain an active coordination with local distributors to ensure enough stock-holding and coverage. 9. Other tasks or projects assigned by line manager 10. Conduct business in full compliance to Behavior in Business and Behavior in Competition Basic Requirements of the Job Education& Qualifications 1. College or above, Medicine or Pharmaceutical Preferred 2. Good command of English in both spoken and written 3. Good command of MS office software application 4. Product & Application Expertise Experience About 1-year related working experiences, good personality, skillful at communicating with others. Strong ability of working independently; Strong ability of bearing hardships

Job Profile Summary Responsible for delivering the indirect sales strategy and financial performance targets including Sales Volume, Gross Margin and Overdue, managing local distributor partners and intermediaries/resellers in the sales territory or geography, finding prospect partners, coaching distributors and monitoring their financial position to ensure long term sustainable value for the company. The scope of the role will influence the grade – this can include financial accountability, geographical scope, leadership responsibilities and overall level of responsibility.  Job Advert Purpose of role ： The Workshop Sales Specialist role exists to manage local top workshop partners in the sales territory. The role is accountable for delivery of the PCO IWS indirect workshop sales strategy and execution of market offer strategy. The role is also responsible of finding and developing prospect partners, and finally contribute to territory distributor’s sales performance. Accountabilities Implement country PCO IWS indirect business strategy within territory by translating it into clear business plans. Deliver IWS channel strategy by developing new customer and continuously improving existing customer in store share in top workshops. Work closely with IWS Territory Manager and Distributor Sales team to secure and improve Castrol market share in workshop level, and finally contribute significant financial performance to distributors. Leverage cross function resources and joint approach for the best outcome. Develop, agree (both internally and externally) and implement the market offer strategy with the Channel partner, providing permanent support in all areas of its contents, and in particular regarding: sales capability (skills and knowledge) b. customer offer deployment, coverage and satisfaction  c. financial Return on Investment and cash flow performance  d. brand representation and compliance  e. HSSE and Ethical compliance Collect the information about the key customer database and manage the pipeline of key customer development. Develop and manage the business relationship with the key customers in the area by using the tools and resources smartly to deliver the desired business results. Share field findings and experience at team level, extracting comparable information. Improve and deliver customer experience in targeted sectors and customer groups. Ensure delivery of our promises by seeking continuous improvement and efficiency in all operations making sure the voice of the customer is represented in every decision we make. Drive standardization of our sales offers in line with our basic customer offer. Ensure that all activities conducted through 3rd parties or intermediaries in country comply fully with our own CoC and local competition legalisation. Ensure compliance with country regulations, bp Group, Segment and regional policies and standards. Experience & Expertise Minimum 3 years working experience in distributor sales and management Track record of delivery of sales targets and performance Experience/track record/confidence representing the company externally and dealing professionally with distributors and workshops. Experience of managing negotiations at senior level. Capability to work independently but also skillful on teamwork. Ability to develop and implement strategic and tactical business plans. We are Covestro. We are curious. We are courageous. We are colorful. We refined Chemical material solutions with game-changing products. Let us empower you to push boundaries. Join us and our 18.150 colleagues now and together we will make the world a brighter place.  Major Tasks  WHAT WE OFFER  Realize sales and develop new customers to achieve short term sales target and long term commitment.  Local key account management, to ensure sales target achieved at respective local key accounts and coordinate within the team to manage our success in the account nationally.  Build a deep understanding of auto industry and behavior of competitors. To be able to identify potential business opportunities and find solutions to secure business. Proactively make analysis based on available information regarding to market trends, strategy of competitors and secure our sustainable position in the industry.  Driving supporting functions to provide suitable package to target accounts, utilize company resources smartly to realize commercialization and result in better financial results.  Regional key account management to ensure Covestro position / strategy to be implemented accordingly, close synergy with regional counter partners  Implement China system house standalone strategy - Work closely with system house to manage production, inventory and delivery, to maximize the profit of the system house by growing the business and cost reduction. Work closely with supply chain/customer to minimize the possibility of aging stock due to EOP and tailor-made products.  Qualification  WHAT YOU OFFER  'Minimum 5 years in sales and marketing experience, Multi-national company experience with technical sales preferred.  University graduate in preferably Engineering, Polymer/ Chemistry, Marketing & Commercial if with additional technical qualifications.  Strong business sense to understand customer needs and manage complicated relationships among stakeholders in the value chain.  Ability to work effectively in teams, diversified culture and people.  Very good communication skills, Can work independently and self motivated.  Very good skills in written and spoken English / Mandarin.  When No University Degree Corresponding Experience Required  At least 10 years experience in product planning or market,development  Value Added To The Company  Ensure that Covestro PUR Marketing & Innovation Strategy are aligned with the business execution, through very close collaboration with different supporting functions.  Ensure Covestro position can be further improved in the existing applications, deliver results of volume and margin expectation.  Develop and realize business in new applications through close cooperation with IM/AD colleagues, ensure the innovation and business sustainability of Covestro.  '(Potential) Customers, OEM, Sales manager/ China and regional team members, Strategic Marketing Functions, AD Functions, Sales Support and Service Functions etc.  YOUR APPLICATION  Are you as curious, courageous and colorful as we are? If so, we can offer you an exciting career opportunity. We look forward to receiving your application including a cover letter, resume/CV, and relevant certificates. Become part of our Team - apply now!  Contact Us  www.covestro.com  Covestro welcomes applications from all individuals, regardless of racial or ethnic origin, skin color, nationality, religion, philosophy, gender, age, disability, appearance or sexual identity. We are committed to treating all applicants fairly and avoiding discrimination.  About Us  Covestro is a world-leading supplier of high-tech polymer materials: innovative, sustainable and diverse.  Thanks to our global presence and close proximity to our customers, we are the partner of choice for a wide variety of industries. Our products and application solutions are used in many areas of modern life.  In line with our vision “To make the world a brighter place,” we work on solutions to the challenges of our time – to push the boundaries of what is possible.  We help make cars lighter so they save fuel. Our insulation systems protect buildings against the heat and cold to reduce energy consumption. In entertainment electronics, our products support functionality, safety and sleek design.  S earch for More Jobs  By submitting your interest in this job, you agree to receive text notifications with additional steps to complete your job application. You will receive up to 6 messages from the number "63879". Message & data rates may apply. Please refer to our privacy policy for more information.

description: Job Description The ideal candidate will lead initiatives to generate and engage with business partners to build new business for the company, which mainly involves crypto trading. This candidate will be focused and have strong communication skills. They should be able to think critically when making plans and have a demonstrated ability to execute a particular strategy. Accept frequent travel.

Company Info  Teva is a global pharmaceutical leader and the world's largest generic medicines producer, committed to improving health and increasing access to quality health solutions worldwide. Our employees are at the core of our success, with colleagues in over 80 countries delivering the world's largest medicine cabinet to 200 million people every day. We offer a uniquely diverse portfolio of products and solutions for patients and we've built a promising pipeline centered around our core therapeutic areas. We are continually developing patient-centric solutions and significantly growing both our generic and specialty medicines business through investment in research and development, marketing, business development and innovation. This is how we improve health and enable people to live better, healthier lives. Join us on our journey of growth! description: Sales Representative  Smith is currently looking for experienced sales professional to join their Asia-Pacific Sales Team. As one of the world’s leading independent electronics distributor, the successful applicants will play a significant role in Smith’s market leading expertise on global electronics sourcing, logistics and distribution.     At Smith, we encourage our sales team to take an entrepreneurial approach to their work, believing that every impact can make a difference. We are looking for talented individuals who are driven, self-motivated and hungry for success. If you are not afraid of a challenge and looking for a rewarding environment, we would like to speak with you.  More senior candidates with more than 4 or 8 years of experience may be considered for a Senior Sales Representative or Sales Manager position.   Key Responsibilities Develop and maintain a portfolio of prospective OEM customers within the region and internationally Become an expert in the customers’ industry and act as the main point of contact for any client related inquiries Identify potential customers and develop sales strategies Provide effective cost-saving solutions (PPV) to customers based on accurate marketplace insight Assist customers to remove excess stock proactively  Requirements Bachelor degree in any disciplines At least 2 years of sales experience in electronics or any relevant industries is highly preferred Passionate, proactive, self-motivated and result-driven Ability to handle work independently, systematically in a fast pace environment Excellent communication skills and passionate in cold calling Good command of both written and oral English and Chinese, Japanese is a plus  About Smith Founded in 1984, Smith is a global distributor of semiconductors and electronic components and a trusted provider of efficiency-enhancing supply chain services to electronics and high-tech manufacturers. Smith’s investment in advanced in-house labs, a highly trained professional team, and strategically located global support centers offers our partners complete sourcing, inventory management solutions, cost-saving program, and more.  A privately held company, Smith employs more than 600 people worldwide, with over $1.39 billion in sales annually. Smith's regional hubs in Houston, Hong Kong, and Amsterdam are ISO-certified. In addition, sales and purchasing offices are located in Austin, Beijing, Silicon Valley, Guadalajara, New York, Beijing, Shanghai, Shenzhen, Seoul, Taipei, Penang, Cluj-Napoca, Munich, and Bangalore.
jobFunction: Supply Chain, Business Development, and Sales

description: Job Overview:  As Junior Account Development Representative you will be responsible for qualifying new potential business opportunities and enriching CRM database with account intelligence and information on new contact personas gathered from conducting outbound prospecting activities. You will be working in collaboration with senior Account Development Representative colleagues on the same team.  Account development is an integral part of the sales and portfolio development teams aligned to support deployment of various go to market tactics including working with social selling channels and leveraging engagement with customers to various direct and indirect run sales programs.  Successful candidate will be able to add good quality business intelligence on target accounts, introduce new qualified contacts on CRM database, and ultimately contribute toward new business closed won revenue. If you are energetic, target focused, and would like to start or develop a new career in sales, this position is a great opportunity to consider.  Main Responsibilities:  Validate new contacts driven from sales and portfolio development engagements Build out buying groups (influencing target personas) to enrich opportunities creating pipeline velocity Identify new contacts by conducting research and outbound prospecting activities for assigned target accounts Create and develop sales pipeline from prospecting activities Gather intelligence and enrich contact records to maintain and evolve CRM data Support collaboration with marketing and sales on the recruitment of key personas, in target accounts, to customer activities such as sales focused events and webinars Develop new sales opportunities identified from Siemens social selling channels    Position Requirements:  A Bachelor's degree or its equivalent work experience Exceptional communication skills both written and verbal, with the ability to listen and comprehend customers’ needs accurately Strong desire in establishing and maintaining strong relationships with client Ability to Work on set routine assignments, often requiring sales judgment Strong organizational, planning, and prioritization skills are required Able to keep forms and record logs maintaining accurate and detailed files on all prospecting activities conducted with individual customer contacts and respective customer accounts Comfortable holding non-scripted sales conversation demonstrating ability to think outside the box in finding new and creative ways to initiate sales discussions with new potential customers Work cross functionally within a dynamic team contributing towards achieving overall corporate goals  Desired Candidates / Advantages:  Previous work experience in similar role with proven track record would be an advantage Sales/customer service role via telephone would be an advantage Exposure of social selling platforms would be an advantage Experience of working with CRM tool (SalesForce.com) would be an advantage High proficiency in the MS Office suite Multi lingual fluency (Mother tongue & +2 other languages) would be an advantage  Organization: Digital Industries  Company: Siemens Industry Software (Shanghai) Co., Ltd.  Experience Level: Early Professional  Job Type: Full-time

Media.Monks is a digital-first marketing and advertising services company connecting the dots across content, data & digital media and technology services. Inspired by the connectivity and flexibility of technology APIs, Media.Monks’ single-P&L model offers brands seamless access to a nearly 6,000-strong team of digital talent organized across 57 talent hubs in 33 countries.  With us, you'll find a diverse group of colleagues with different backgrounds and perspectives. We believe everyone has something of value to offer, and that sustaining a truly diverse, equitable and inclusive workplace begins with fostering an environment where people can be themselves, authentically, every day. We want to build something with the potential to change the heart of our industry, and we’d love to include your unique perspective.  The Associate Account Manager program provides a broad-based exposure to display, search, marketing, creative, sales, operations, and product functions, providing training and development to prepare AAMs to move into Account Management or other advanced roles.  Responsibilities Will Include  Campaign design & management within advanced programmatic advertising platforms for display, mobile, social, video, search, analytics, adserving, and creative design. Analyzing data for reporting and optimizing advertising campaigns. Providing analysis, insight, and expertise for clients on our products and offerings. Development of campaign, marketing, sales, and operational materials and best practices for internal teams and clients. Supporting sales team with pre-sales and marketing efforts. Managing strategic initiatives to improve the business processes and operations as MightyHive continues to grow at a rapid pace.  Qualifications/Background Sought  Strong data analysis abilities. Exceptional ability to learn, adapt, and discover and test new ideas. Desire to work in a fast-paced, high-pressure, and fun startup environment. Desire to build a company up from an early stage.  About Media.Monks  At Media.Monks, you’ll be joining a highly ambitious company on a global mission to win the decade by changing the industry for good. Partner to 8 of the 10 most innovative companies in the world, Media.Monks works with established as well as up-and-coming global, regional, DTC and B2B brands, helping them own their data and build out customer ecosystems to elicit smart, efficient, high-impact engines for growth. We deliver table stakes quickly, creating cost efficiencies from day one to push up the creative effectiveness of our work with every cycle.  We are an equal-opportunity employer committed to building a respectful and empowering work environment for all people to freely express themselves amongst colleagues who embrace diversity in all respects. Including fresh voices and unique points of view in all aspects of our business not only creates an environment where we can all grow and thrive but also increases our potential to produce work that better represents—and resonates with—the world around us.

description: Job Profile Summary Responsible for delivering the indirect sales strategy and financial performance targets including Sales Volume, Gross Margin and Overdue, managing local distributor partners and intermediaries/resellers in the sales territory or geography, finding prospect partners, coaching distributors and monitoring their financial position to ensure long term sustainable value for the company. The scope of the role will influence the grade – this can include financial accountability, geographical scope, leadership responsibilities and overall level of responsibility.  Job Advert Purpose of role ： The Workshop Sales Specialist role exists to manage local top workshop partners in the sales territory. The role is accountable for delivery of the PCO IWS indirect workshop sales strategy and execution of market offer strategy. The role is also responsible of finding and developing prospect partners, and finally contribute to territory distributor’s sales performance. Accountabilities Implement country PCO IWS indirect business strategy within territory by translating it into clear business plans. Deliver IWS channel strategy by developing new customer and continuously improving existing customer in store share in top workshops. Work closely with IWS Territory Manager and Distributor Sales team to secure and improve Castrol market share in workshop level, and finally contribute significant financial performance to distributors. Leverage cross function resources and joint approach for the best outcome. Develop, agree (both internally and externally) and implement the market offer strategy with the Channel partner, providing permanent support in all areas of its contents, and in particular regarding: sales capability (skills and knowledge) b. customer offer deployment, coverage and satisfaction  c. financial Return on Investment and cash flow performance  d. brand representation and compliance  e. HSSE and Ethical compliance Collect the information about the key customer database and manage the pipeline of key customer development. Develop and manage the business relationship with the key customers in the area by using the tools and resources smartly to deliver the desired business results. Share field findings and experience at team level, extracting comparable information. Improve and deliver customer experience in targeted sectors and customer groups. Ensure delivery of our promises by seeking continuous improvement and efficiency in all operations making sure the voice of the customer is represented in every decision we make. Drive standardization of our sales offers in line with our basic customer offer. Ensure that all activities conducted through 3rd parties or intermediaries in country comply fully with our own CoC and local competition legalisation. We are Covestro. We are curious. We are courageous. We are colorful. We refined Chemical material solutions with game-changing products. Let us empower you to push boundaries. Join us and our 18.150 colleagues now and together we will make the world a brighter place.  What We Offer  Position Description (Major tasks, Value added, Contribution context, Work relations, Qualifications)  Major Tasks Be aware of full global picture and determine account strategy in alignment with strategy in EE China. Understand responsible for strategic customer needs and wants and develop value creation plan for the account; be full responsible for the account’s volume, turnover and profitability according to target. Develop, coordinate, monitor and update specific tactical measures to implement account strategy with account team by giving strategic price direction for the account value chain and co-ordinate global pricing discussions, and monitoring account performance and recommend improvement actions. Identifies and maps key decision makers in customers’ value; builds, maintains, and develops relationships with the key decision makers on different working levels . Develop 3-5 years key accounts plans in line with industry, application and product strategies; communicates the strategy and account plans with internal supportive functions. X-function collaborating work such as commercializing new business with efficient teamwork together with sales to launch new applications, cooperating with BD/ PRDC to build-up solutions and transferring new technical requests from market to internal. This role is in fact to lead a virtual team to work with 1 core biz (mobile phone + TV) and 100+ eco system companies including China #1 luggage Runmi, #1 ARVC (automatic robotic vacuum cleaner) Rockbro, #1 outdoor scooter Ninebot… The role also needs to work with BJ Mi HQ, different eco companies HQ (both R&D and supply chain) and down to earth to molder level. The position needs to combine both strategic thinking, virtual team leadership, business tactic expert and detail operation. To further grow the business in MI which is the fastest growing company in China, the KAM also needs to develop new business out of existing big 5 eco to penetrate into more new companies and applications. Moreover, as Mi is moving overseas very quickly (mobile phone already global #2 and target to be #1 in 3 years as per Lei Jun’s vision) together with several plants set up from India to , we also need this key account manager to have strong global thinking and internal resource alignment and adjustment. The BE to cover will not only limited to EP resin business but also includes TPU (quite often bonded with PC or PC/ABS) and composite (both on notebook and high end luggage). Value Added Makes Covestro the leading innovation partner and material supplier (in line with our marketing strategy, technology-, innovation-, and product-portfolio) for the nominated strategic account. Build up value proposition for new applications with feasible toolkit for sales to ensure the efficient business development. Work Relations  External: external customer (all levels and functions; including general management, R&D, and Marketing departments ), customer’s industry value chain partners .  Internal: All required functions within EP , Mar keting, Innovation, and PM; the Covestro Industrial Marketing groups and the other industrial marketing functions of other BUs; the Supply Chain Centers; senior management.  What You Offer  Qualifications: Bachelor degree in chemical or economics , and MBA is the plus. At least 5 years' working experience in related industries with positions in sales or marketing relative functions. Skill in project management with experience in coordinating multi-tasks, collaborating with multi-teams to drive out project objectives within timeline. Leadership capabilities and good communication skill. 5 . Able to travel frequently.  6 . Well-developed technical and sales skills are necessary in order to maintain credibility and respect at these large, multi-national companies. A thorough knowledge and understanding of Covestro’s internal structure, personnel and capabilities are also of great importance. The ability to clearly express thoughts and ideas, both orally and written, in Chinese and English, is an important ingredient in discussions with the accounts and Covestro personnel. In addition, excellent listening skills are required in order to fully grasp account viewpoints and needs from Covestro. Must be able to motivate, coach and direct a broad spectrum of people without having direct authority over them; effectively work across matrices and command respect of his/her peer group and the marketplace. Demonstrated proficiency in sales10.Full knowledge of the product line and its applications YOUR APPLICATION Are you as curious, courageous and colorful as we are? If so, we can offer you an exciting career opportunity. We look forward to receiving your application including a cover letter, resume/CV, and relevant certificates. Become part of our Team - apply now! Contact Us  www.covestro.com  Covestro welcomes applications from all individuals, regardless of racial or ethnic origin, skin color, nationality, religion, philosophy, gender, age, disability, appearance or sexual identity. We are committed to treating all applicants fairly and avoiding discrimination.

description: 主要职责 ： 招聘，发展和保留一个多样化的，高效的团队，同时提供持续的职业指导，成长和个人发展的机会。 准备年度地区销售预测，并参与评估市场潜力和销售费用估算。 确保销售和商业目标的达成。 综合客户和竞争对手的洞察，市场和行业挑战，以及APOC产品解决方案，以推动区域长期战略和培养长期客户关系。 区域医院KOL发展与维护 在计划和组织工作中锻炼强化判断能力;监控团队绩效;解决问题并确定根本原因，以防止再次发生 参与市场营销策略的制定和实施 建议，解释和执行公司，部门或组织特定的政策和程序，以完成业务目标，解决问题，并确保员工遵守这些政策，实践和程序。 掌握专业知识领域的最新发展，合规要求，公司的产品，市场，目标和行业趋势的全面知识 要求 ： 学士学位及以上。商业、生命科学或相关医学技术学科 7年以上复杂销售环境的销售经验(多个利益相关者，多个决策者，产品与目标/计划一致) 4年以上医院/医疗销售经验 2年以上领导能力，有发展、培训、指导销售团队的经验; 有医疗设备或诊断行业经验者优先。 能够运用正规的销售培训经验和个人丰富的销售经验，在复杂的销售环境中发展团队。 有证可循的优秀销售业绩和销售领导能力。 熟练使用MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word)

SALES REPRESENTATIVE - CHINA CENTRAL & WEST  A fantastic opportunity to join a fast growing and dynamic spirits company with numerous new product launches planned for the next 18 months. The Crimson Spirits Company is looking to hire a Sales Representative based in China Central, ideally Chengdu. You will work as part of a small, but dynamic and motivated team, working on driving sales for our in-house brands and products.   JOB RESPONSIBILITIES Contacting potential and existing clients to establish rapport and arrange meetings. Strong focus on clients in Central China, covering Sichuan, Chongqing and Shaanxi, as key areas. Helping to plan and oversee new marketing initiatives alongside the Shanghai marketing manager Researching bars, restaurants, hotels and distributors to find new business opportunities  Increase the value of current customers while attracting new ones Finding and developing new markets in the China Central and boosting sales revenue. Monthly and quarterly sales reports.   CANDIDATE 1-2 years experience in sales, preferably in the Food and Beverage industry  Strong communication skills Ability to manage complex projects and multitask. Be personal and amiable.  Ability to flourish with minimal guidance, be proactive and handle uncertainty Be goal orientated and sales driven Good level of English required  SALARY & BENEFITS Basic salary of 8,000-10,000/month DOE + structured monthly commission  Travel expenses covered   WORK HOURS Monday - Friday 14:00-22:00 (office hours, plus visiting clients)  LOCATION Work remotely, Chengdu or Chongqing candidate ideal.

Job Purpose and Impact  The Key Account Executive II, with general supervision, will help build and maintain our customer relations with strategic accounts that typically involve an international partner or major global accounts. We seek a professional who will help identify and contact prospective customers, building relationships to generate future sales and repeat business. In this role, you will contribute to assessing customer needs and suggesting appropriate products, services and solutions.  Key Accountabilities With guidance, help identify, develop and close new sales. Support business growth by disseminating information that favorably promotes our organization and its products and services. Monitor customer and competitor activity and industry trends. Coordinate market research, pricing and sales and merchandising activities. Participate in regular status and strategy meetings with customers' senior management to understand and meet their needs. Independently solve moderately complex issues with minimal supervision, while escalating more complex issues to appropriate staff. Other duties as assigned Qualifications  Minimum Qualifications Minimum of two years of related work experience Other minimum qualifications may apply

description: Account Executive - Remote  App Annie is always looking for extraordinary candidates with Mobile, SaaS, analytics background and we'd love to get to know you! We do not have any current openings for an Account Executive in this location, however, in the event that a position opens up, we'd love for you to be the first person to know! Below is what we traditionally look for:  Something About Us...  App Annie is the industry’s most trusted mobile data and analytics platform. Our mission is to help customers create winning mobile experiences and achieve excellence. We created the mobile app data market and are committed to delivering the industry’s most complete mobile performance offering. We are headquartered in San Francisco with 12 offices worldwide. More than 1,200 enterprise clients and 1 million registered users across the globe and spanning all industries rely on App Annie as the standard to revolutionize their mobile business.  Along with a market defining product, we take great pride in our culture and values and strive to embody them daily! We set a high bar for our success and have made Excellence as our our standard, hold each other Accountable, continuously push Innovation and Win with Style  What can you tell your friends when they ask you what you do?  I’m responsible for driving new business and managing customers. With a strong passion for our customers, our primary focus is growing and nurturing them!  You will be responsible for and take pride in…  App Annie is looking for an experienced, versatile and highly motivated Account Executive with SaaS experience. If you have mobile, and analytics in your background, that’s even better!. You will drive new business as well as manage the existing book of business. Being an expert and presenting how our product suite can help a company create winning strategies for the mobile market Managing the entire sales process from prospecting to close in your assigned territory (including but not limited to email campaigns, cold calling, networking, conferences, trade shows etc.) Developing and maintaining a substantial pipeline of qualified opportunities and consistently maintain an accurate forecast Updating and creating consultative sales proposals and reports as required Managing the entire sales process from prospecting & negotiation to closure Collaborating with internal and external stakeholders to manage complex sales opportunities You can recognize yourself in the following... You have a University Degree or equivalent - Masters/MBA an advantage Excellent communication skills both written and oral in both English and Native language You have extensive dedicated experience in solution selling, selling data analytics tools in Enterprise sales, the mobile app industry or digital marketing space and managing multiple accounts across a variety of different verticals within the mobile app industry A keenly developed competitive nature, mature personality, great team player and constant learner with a technical aptitude to master our products Consistent quarter over quarter track-record of quota attainment Superior communication skills, incredible writing skills, and the ability to capture an audience during a presentation You can have accurate forecasting and pipeline management skills You have experience selling to the media; entertainment, travel, gaming, finance, and retail You are proficient with Salesforce, Google Docs, MS Office and Mac OS suite. And not to forget- tons of energy, passion, humour, and enthusiasm This Is What We Offer… We provide a WFH allowance to set you up for remote work success. Internet allowance for stable internet connection, so your video does not freeze on Zoom. Flexible working days. We love to meet, but if you need to get your kids behind school-zoom, need to leave early to get to your band repetition or gym classes, do your thing. Paid leave, so long as you promise to come back! Health and dental benefits. An international team of talented and engaged people from different cultural backgrounds and locations. Wellbeing allowance for any activity that matters to your wellbeing; (online) gym classes, fitness equipment, mindfulness apps or even childcare support! Unlimited access to online learning platform Udemy to help you develop your skills. Virtual initiatives and events to keep you connected with your colleagues. Yes, I want this job!

description: Job Description The ideal candidate will lead initiatives to generate and engage with business partners to build new business for the company, which mainly involves crypto trading. This candidate will be focused and have strong communication skills. They should be able to think critically when making plans and have a demonstrated ability to execute a particular strategy.  Responsibilities Work with lawyers on setting up the new overseas fund Develop new relationships in an effort to grow business and help company expand Maintain existing investor relations Think critically when planning to assure project success  Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience 3 – 4 years’ prior industry related business development experience Strong communication and interpersonal skills Strong sales & relationship management experience Focused and goal-oriented Interested in virtual asset related industry Previous knowledge or connections in virtual asset industry would be a plus  Location Flexible, preferably Beijing or Hong Kong. Accept frequent travel.

工作职责:  Job Description Summary  Customer facing staff responsible for winning business Executes standard sales tasks and typically subject to instructions and work routines. There is latitude to rearrange the sequence to complete task/duties based on changing work situations. May be responsible for targeted clients, stable regions, and/or small/medium sales territories.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Roles and Responsibilities Selling to or through partners and distributors. May include channel sales support and channel development duties. Broadening knowledge of own sales territory, product lines, markets, sales processes or customer groups to execute policy/strategy. Still acquiring higher level knowledge and skills. Basic understanding of key business drivers; uses this understanding to accomplish own work. Good understanding of how work of own team integrates with other teams and contributes to the area. May have some autonomy to make decisions within a defined framework. Resolves issues in situations that require commercial knowledge and judgment within established procedures. Consults more senior team members for issues outside of defined instructions/parameters. A job at this level requires good interpersonal skills. Communication with direct colleagues and the business about design and coordination services rendered. For customer facing roles, develops strong customer relationships and serves as the interface between customer and GE. Explains technical information to others. 任职条件:  Required Qualifications For roles outside of the USA- This role requires basic experience in the Sales & Channel Sales. Knowledge level is comparable to a Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college ( or a high school diploma with relevant experience). For roles in USA - Bachelor's degree from an accredited university or college (or a high school diploma / GED with at least 6 years of experience in Job Family Group(s)/Function(s)). Desired Characteristics  Strong oral and written communication skills. Ability to document, plan, market, and execute programs.  Note  To comply with US immigration and other legal requirements, it is necessary to specify the minimum number of years’ experience required for any role based within the USA. For roles outside of the USA, to ensure compliance with applicable legislation, the JDs should focus on the substantive level of experience required for the role and a minimum number of years should NOT be used.  Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

description: Job Description  My client is leading multinational industrial group with strong busienss growth in Asia including China. 我的客户是一家领先的跨国工业品集团， 亚洲以及中国业务处于高速发展中。  Job Responsibilities  岗位职责：  The role will be acting as a strategic busienss develper facing Japniese clients (Automotive, Aero, Energy, General industrial) in China, to establish and maintain high-level relationships with client's management adn key decision makders; The role will, on a regular basis, interact with internal stake holders in both sales and technical, as well as peers from other countries (Japan) .  该职位作为日系客户（汽车， 航空，能源，通用工业等）的战略业务拓展， 需要与客户高层以及关键决策者建立以及维护良好的商务关系。同时，内部需要与销售和技术团队， 以及跨国团队（日本）紧密配合。  Key Requirements：  关键任职条件： A degree in engineering or technological field. 工程或技术类专业毕业。 Solid and proven expereince within Japanese business loop in China, highy familiar wiht the culture. 扎实的日系客户对接经验，熟知日本商业文化。 Expereince in mechanical, machining industires. 机械、机加工行业从业经历。 Strong commercial sense, market acumen and sales skills. 很强的市场敏嗅觉，销售技巧。 Fluent Japanese, and workable English. 日语流利， 英语至少可工作使用（书面和简单的口语交流，流利最好） If you want to get more job opportunities, please reach out (如果你想了解更多的职位机会，请点击): https://www.rgf-professional.com.cn/zh/jobs

description: This is an opportunity to join a fast-growing business that supplies over sixty fashion brands to retailers across the globe. This is achieved by wholesaling emerging brands through dedicated showroom platforms including London, Paris, Milan, New York and Shanghai . Customer orders are fulfilled directly through the brands where Tomorrow acts as an agent or directly through Tomorrow’s warehouses where we act as a distributor.  Our unique position and experience allows emerging brands to benefit from operational experience that delivers opportunities for growth in the global market. (See details of brands we are currently partnering with at www.tomorrowltd.com ).  Who We Are Looking For  We are looking for a passionate Regional Sales Associate to manage Tomorrow fashion brands in Greater China Region. This is a position of critical importance to the future growth and development of the Tomorrow wholesale business in Asia.  What Your Day To Day Will Look Like Deliver strong sales performance and direction within the high segment Womenswear and Menswear business in your region. Execute sales/channel strategy, lead by local leadership, that are appropriate for the target customer & market by articulating the Brands expression as distinct product values and, aesthetics, and to communicate succinctly this vision to the customer and future prospects. Execute the strategy for Tomorrow fashion brands, in collaboration with the local leadership team and brand management team in headquarter, further developing the brands already impressive brand heritage, DNA and high-quality product offering globally. Create a first-class Product Merchandising strategy & process that supports. Meet company targets by determining goals and objectives in sales and profits for the category.  What you need to succeed? A minimum of 3 years of experience in a similar role within the fashion industry Understanding of local sales processes and market knowledge, driven by consumer insight and data Strong closing skills. Prior attendance at formal sales training courses is a plus Initiative & ability to influence and take action where necessary A clear, concise communication and interpersonal skills and eye for detail Problem solving & leadership skills The ability to work under pressure and resolve conflict Clientele management experience, preferably of an operational staff Fluent in English and Mandarin  We strongly encourage people of colour, lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer and non-binary people, veterans, parents, and individuals with disabilities to apply. Tomorrow Ltd is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes everyone to our team. If you need reasonable adjustments at any point in the application or interview process, please let us know.
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Internet

Critical Analyses and Customer Insight Collect, analyze and discover business opportunities and potential risks based on insight generation from market data, sales data and customer understanding etc.  Strategic Thinking and Marketing plan Develop marketing plan to translate insights and growth opportunity into real practice and solutions, including marketing strategy, activity design, resource and sales projection. Design of marketing activities to different customers and keep monitoring the activity execution together with field team to ensure high quality execution and iteration for better performance.  Drive for Results Pursue and implement marketing programs in partnership with key customers that support positive evolution of current business strategy and model, drive for results on key programs for better patient benefits and business healthy growth.  Strategic agility & Communication Be at the forefront of identifying early, emerging customer and/or channel trends and create actionable insights that support decision-maker next steps Advanced communication and interpersonal skills, ability to work collaboratively with different functions.

description: Leon Cycle is an e-bike business that was established in Germany in 2014 and has since developed business operations in over 10 countries across Europe, North America and APAC. Leon Cycle offers a range of e-bike models from mountain bikes, folding e-bikes, trekking e-bikes and step thru e-bikes. Our range of products are sold via both our own online website as well as E-Commerce platforms and via our dealers and our own retail stores worldwide.  Shanghai is the global commercial headquarter of Leon Cycle, currently we are hiring E-Commerce/Sales & Operations Specialists to join our Shanghai HQ, you will be tasked with:  Take part in the definition of the overall global digital sales strategy Work hand in hand with marketing team to drive organic traffic, develop sales Constantly optimize online stores to maximize conversion rates and performance Overall management of Leon Cycle website, Amazon and other local 3rd party E-Commerce platform stores such as planning, daily operations, advertising and promotions for Italy marketplace Set up SEO to increase online presence of our website Set up digital marketing and sales campaigns through Google, Facebook and other medium Scheduling and communicating intensive site maintenance as needed, Follow the global strategy to position the brand as a top e-bike player in local countries Analyze sales-related data to predict future sales and stock forecasts Coordinating operational issues including customer services, logistics and warehouse and other enquiries between Italian team and Shanghai  Furthermore you should have:  1-3 years of working experience in E-Commerce, sales or consumer goods or marketing Experience working with an international brand Fluency in Spanish, Chinese and English Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Familiar with google and Facebook and other internet tools

FULLTIME: ROASTER SUCCESS AND BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT Coffee Exchange is a global coffee marketplace that connects coffee farmers directly to coffee roasters. Using transparency and supply chain tracking technology the Coffee Exchange is changing how Coffee is traded on the planet. Coffee Exchange has operations in over 10 origins and imports coffee into China and the USA.  RESPONSIBILITES ·      Roaster Relationship Management -      Connect with existing roasters to gain a deeper understanding of customer demands -      Contact all new roasters to introduce Coffee Exchange and learn about their operations -      Act as the main contact point for all questions and issues ·      Business Development -      Prospect and develop a database of new leads using various online channels (Taobao, JD, Ect.) -      Call new leads to introduce the Coffee Exchange platform and offer samples -      Document the optimal process from Lead Generation to New Client within a CEx sales manual that can be used to onboard and teach new colleagues ·      Samples Tracking and Execution -      Ensure that samples are offered to all appropriate roasters for each incoming batch -      Follow-up on samples sent to obtain feedback on coffee and book product orders -      Manage and continuously improve sample distribution and follow-up system ·      Business Development Events -      Project manager for Coffee Exchange booth and operations at trade events such as HotelX, Beijing Coffee Show, Etc. -      Plan booth design, cupping activities and sales + marketing materials -      Pitch and execute other in person coffee events to attract new clients and followers  Requirements ·      Languages: Native level Chinese and fluent English ·      Experience within Sales, Account Management and/or Customer Success ·      Ability to self-manage time and projects ·      Knowledge of and interest in the coffee industry ·      Passion for startups and desire to learn! ·      Unlimited free coffee  Benefits ·      8,000 RMB (Net) base salary 20,000 RMB on target earnings ·      Advancement and growth opportunities ·      Fast paced, supportive and fun working environment

jobTitle: Sales Representative / Business Development / Field Sales
description: The function of the Sales Representative is to provide ongoing development of existing and prospective DJO LLC customers to ensure sales growth in the Companion Animal Health (CAH) product lines. The fully- seasoned sales professional will perform field promotional work and relationship management to sell and develop new and existing business.  Essential Functions • Responsible for field and promotional work and relationship management to sell and develop new and existing business • Responsible for the sales of all Companion Animal Health product lines including laser therapy, cold compression, stance analyzer, and regenerative medicine • Work with current major accounts, development of new territories, new industries, or with customers where the full market potential or product acceptance has not been established. • Meet and exceed established Monthly, Quarterly and Yearly sales goals • Demonstrates products/services and provides product application advice. • Coordinates company technical engineering services to develop solutions to customers’ needs. • Prepares price quotations, communicates or negotiates terms and conditions of sales within limits of authority, and writes orders subject to company policy. • Develops data relative to marketing trends, competitive products and pricing, and submits marketing reports to management. • As required, prepares and submits reports on sales and marketing activities Competencies • Organizational Skills • Customer service focused • Initiative • Thoroughness and Detail-oriented • Time Management • Communication Proficiency  Travel This position requires frequent travel, more than 50%. Most travel is local, however some outside the local area and overnight will be required.  Required Education and Experience • Associates degree and minimum of 1 year experience Preferred Education and Experience • BS/BA in Business Administration or Health Science • Positive attitude, exemplary attendance, and reliable team member  ABOUT DJO GLOBAL DJO Global is a leading global developer, manufacturer and distributor of high-quality medical devices that provide solutions for musculoskeletal health, vascular health and pain management. Our products address the continuum of patient care from injury prevention to rehabilitation after surgery, injury or from degenerative disease, enabling people to regain or maintain their natural motion. Our products are used by orthopedic specialists, spine surgeons, primary care physicians, pain management specialists, physical therapists, podiatrists, chiropractors, athletic trainers and other healthcare professionals. In addition, many of our medical devices and related accessories are used by athletes and patients for injury prevention and at-home physical therapy treatment. Product lines include rigid and soft orthopedic bracing, hot and cold therapy, bone growth stimulators, vascular therapy systems and compression garments, therapeutic shoes and inserts, electrical stimulators used for pain management and physical therapy products. Our surgical division offers a comprehensive suite of reconstructive joint products for the hip, knee and shoulder. Our products are marketed under a portfolio of brands including Aircast®, Chattanooga, CMF™, Compex®, DonJoy®, ProCare®, Exos™, Dr. Comfort®, DonJoy Performance® and DJO® Surgical.  For additional information on the Company, please visit www.DJOglobal.com. DJO is a growing subsidiary of diversified technology leader Colfax Corporation  EOE AA M/F/VET/Disability  All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment and will not be discriminated against on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, protected veteran status, disability, or any other basis protected by federal, state or local laws.  Full time  R0014808 About Us Please visit us at http://www.djoglobal.com.
industries: Medical Devices, Hospital & Health Care, and Veterinary

description: Job Purpose and Impact  The Key Account Executive II, with general supervision, will help build and maintain our customer relations with strategic accounts that typically involve an international partner or major global accounts. We seek a professional who will help identify and contact prospective customers, building relationships to generate future sales and repeat business. In this role, you will contribute to assessing customer needs and suggesting appropriate products, services and solutions.  Key Accountabilities With guidance, help identify, develop and close new sales. Support business growth by disseminating information that favorably promotes our organization and its products and services. Monitor customer and competitor activity and industry trends. Coordinate market research, pricing and sales and merchandising activities. Participate in regular status and strategy meetings with customers' senior management to understand and meet their needs. Independently solve moderately complex issues with minimal supervision, while escalating more complex issues to appropriate staff. Other duties as assigned Qualifications  Minimum Qualifications Minimum of two years of related work experience Other minimum qualifications may apply

description: Major Responsibilities Take charge in promotion of diabetic products in target area, and realize sales target of the company. Client management in the target area, including filing and updating client data, maintaining client relations, and utilizing resources of the company in a reasonable manner. Complete various statements required by the company. Collect information of the rivals in the area. Observe OEC policy of the company in a strict manner, and effectively implement the marketing plan. Minimum Education Required  Associate degree or above, medicine, pharmacy or related field preferred  Minimum Experience Required 2 years or above sales experience in pharmaceuticals or medical devices, work experience in foreign companies preferred. Excellent sales sense and strong capacity of judgment as well. Good communication and language skills. Love sales, responsible and be able to bear pressure. Team spirit, be able to bear hardships and stand hard work.

Location: Shanghai Primarily responsible for driving incremental revenue for SM (Software Monetization) business in Eastern China. To achieve the sales targets, the Sales Manager proactively works with Sales Engineer, Solution Sales and Product management to lead the whole sales cycle in discovering new big potential opportunities as well as driving the existing business to grow. In addition to do daily sales management work, this position needs to involve a broad range of sales related activities, including but not limited to participate and represent SM business at tradeshows, conferences with customers, workshops and online virtual meetings. Present our company and solution’s value to key customers and prospects, develop business value oriented solutions and strategy to win the competition against alternative solutions and competitors, and analyze industries trends, build deep trust with high level management of customers, to ensure our SM products and solutions remain leading position in the market. Key responsibilities of this job: ·       Developing new big opportunities and building pipelines on SM business ·       Regular meetings with key accounts and partners, maintain and driving the existing business to grow ·       Implementing company strategies and proactively tracking results ·       Partnership management and support ·       Inspiring partners to develop new business and expand to new areas ·       Support regional marketing programs and events ·       Regular meeting and reporting sales forecast and new business opportunities to management ·       The candidate will report to China Regional Sales Director   Knowledge, Skills and Experience: ·       This candidate must have 5-8 years of direct touch sales experience and experience with channel partners management ·       The candidate must have 5+ years of software solution selling experience and well understand software monetization market is preferred ·       Have a Bachelor's degree, Business or IT related major is preferred ·       Candidate must be proficient in English speaking and written ·       Candidate must be proactive personality and willing to take pressure

description: Job Profile Summary Responsible for delivering the indirect sales strategy and financial performance targets including Sales Volume, Gross Margin and Overdue, managing local distributor partners and intermediaries/resellers in the sales territory or geography, finding prospect partners, coaching distributors and monitoring their financial position to ensure long term sustainable value for the company. The scope of the role will influence the grade – this can include financial accountability, geographical scope, leadership responsibilities and overall level of responsibility.  Job Advert Purpose of role ： The Workshop Sales Specialist role exists to manage local top workshop partners in the sales territory. The role is accountable for delivery of the PCO IWS indirect workshop sales strategy and execution of market offer strategy. The role is also responsible of finding and developing prospect partners, and finally contribute to territory distributor’s sales performance. Accountabilities Implement country PCO IWS indirect business strategy within territory by translating it into clear business plans. Deliver IWS channel strategy by developing new customer and continuously improving existing customer in store share in top workshops. Work closely with IWS Territory Manager and Distributor Sales team to secure and improve Castrol market share in workshop level, and finally contribute significant financial performance to distributors. Leverage cross function resources and joint approach for the best outcome. Develop, agree (both internally and externally) and implement the market offer strategy with the Channel partner, providing permanent support in all areas of its contents, and in particular regarding: sales capability (skills and knowledge) b. customer offer deployment, coverage and satisfaction  c. financial Return on Investment and cash flow performance  d. brand representation and compliance  e. HSSE and Ethical compliance Collect the information about the key customer database and manage the pipeline of key customer development. Develop and manage the business relationship with the key customers in the area by using the tools and resources smartly to deliver the desired business results. Share field findings and experience at team level, extracting comparable information. Improve and deliver customer experience in targeted sectors and customer groups. Ensure delivery of our promises by seeking continuous improvement and efficiency in all operations making sure the voice of the customer is represented in every decision we make. Drive standardization of our sales offers in line with our basic customer offer. Ensure that all activities conducted through 3rd parties or intermediaries in country comply fully with our own CoC and local competition legalisation. Ensure compliance with country regulations, bp Group, Segment and regional policies and standards. Experience & Expertise Minimum 3 years working experience in distributor sales and management Track record of delivery of sales targets and performance Experience/track record/confidence representing the company externally and dealing professionally with distributors and workshops. Experience of managing negotiations at senior level. Capability to work independently but also skillful on teamwork. Ability to develop and implement strategic and tactical business plans. Ability to be hands on and drive the business with direct responsibility Flexibility of thought and action to be able to respond to changing market environments and dynamic business situations Adapted for frequent business travel We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.  Entity Customers & Products  Job Family Group Sales Group  Relocation available No  Travel Required Yes - up to 75%  Country China  About BP CUSTOMER AND PRODUCTS We’re gearing up for the future. At bp our goal for C&P is to deliver the future of mobility, energy and services for our customers by innovating with new business models and service platforms.  C&P will become a hub, housing our midstream, lubricants, aviation, sale of chemicals, mobility and convenience, marketing and our next-generation businesses, making it a highly integrated and interconnected organisation. And with safety being our core value, our commitment to safe and reliable operations will never change.  Want to join the team? This means: being customer-centric, agile and responsive to changing customer needs and dynamic markets focusing on growth and development of customer offers optimising the chemicals and fuels value chains to maximise integrated value contributing to the reduction of carbon intensity of the products we create, and sell, by 50% by 2050 or sooner creating strategic partnerships that drive long-term value for C&P being digitally enabled and empowered by customer insights and data to deliver solutions. Experience Level Intermediate

EBANX is a global fintech company that emerged in 2012 with the mission of connecting companies to Latin America, facilitating payments on international sites such as Aliexpress, Airbnb, Sony, Spotify, and many others. As we grew, our portfolio also expanded and we went beyond payment methods. Today we offer solutions in local processing for Brazilian companies and different products and services for our final consumers. We are called ebankers and we are changing the way people buy, connect, and live globally. Do you want to join our Big Dream and be part of this team?  We are seeking an ambitious, self-motivated and disciplined Business Development to be part of a high growth technology and payments company with a solid track record of delivering high value to our customers.  In this role, your responsibilities will be: Identify new opportunities, develop new business and close deals; On-site selling and also managing opportunities around the globe, remotely; Market development focused on the segment of digital goods, E-commercial, marketplace, the sky is the limit; Report your sales progressions on Salesforce; Make assertive forecasts for on going negotiations; Become an expert in the international payments market.  What is indispensable for the job? Relevant experience Sales with a successful track record, preferably within a high growth company; Experience selling B2B services: SaaS, ERP, digital services and/or payment solutions; Knowledge of driving complex sales processes; Pipeline and CRM competence: knows how to manage a pipeline over time and forecast sales; Have a can-do attitude, be able to articulate and overcome failure, and have a resilient mindset to thrive within a competitive environment; Self-starter comfortable in an entrepreneurial setting; ability to prioritize and deliver results in a fast-paced and dynamic environment; Have outstanding communication and interpersonal skills, including developing relationships, negotiating, and building influence; Fluent English is mandatory.  What else would we like to see? Big Dream; Results Driven; Team player mindset;  EBANX offers: A challenging environment, with opportunities to growth; Casual office and dress code; Spanish, English and Portuguese classes; WAVES - Program of goals and results (variable compensation); Semi flexible hours (8 hours a day - Monday to Friday);  Follow us on Instagram and look for the hashtag #ebanxlife to learn more about EBANX's culture.
