According to the company's strategy and market conditions, develop sales channels to increase market share. Be able to independently develop key customer resources, find potential customer resources, and complete sales plans and targets.  Sounds like you? Seize this opportunity before it’s too late; contact Rachel at tangli@vidoukin.com.  #automotive #automotiveengineering #manager #changshu #hr #hiring #recruitment #humanresources #jobs #careers #sales #salesdevelopment

工作职责:  Job Description Summary  As a Senior Account Sales, you will develop & implement One GE Healthcare sales strategy by maintaining commercial relationships/alliances with Accounts at zone level, e.g. hospitals, hospital groups, government bodies or Group Purchasing Organizations. It's a role that will be responsible for maintaining a detailed understanding of assigned accounts’ business and keeping GE Healthcare Zone, Region & Product management informed and appropriately involved. You will be expected to lead & close multimodality and single product deals in their assigned accounts.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Primary Responsibilities  Financial Performance Achieve sales and orders volumes at the target prices in assigned accounts/territory. Coordinate orders and sales forecasts within the applicable sales funnel tools and reports for in their assigned territory/accounts in conjunction with Product Sales Specialist/product Specialists. Account Management Maintain relationships, develop a business strategy, and maximize business opportunities for all GE Healthcare businesses, products & services within allocated accounts/territory (or within defined care area/department scope). Represent OneGEHC in the account or care area/department and acts as a primary customer point of contact in the allocated accounts/territory. Provide on-going feedback to management, product teams, services and marketing. Maintain Go-to-Market plans in conjunction with Zone cross functional and multi-product teams to achieve targets and grow GE’s share of customer investments in capital, diagnostics and operational expenditures. Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through consistent high quality interactions with customer management. Build long term strategic alliance with portfolio of accounts to continue to add value, and promote Service offerings to identify and escalate commercial service needs to drive customer NPS. In cooperation with Product teams and Marketing, drive One GE Healthcare promotional events in assigned territory. Be aware of customer segmentation and promote offerings relevant to each client’s segment. Opportunity Management Prospecting for new customers and business opportunities in addition to growing and maintaining the existing customer portfolio. Prioritize new leads to create a balanced sales funnel for future sales. Lead and leverage Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialists, Care Area or Category Leaders, Service Operations and other Company resources to provide the necessary technical, clinical and business content to create a competitive differentiation. Coordinate One GE Healthcare team on assigned accounts in order to deliver solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations. Lead & coordinate multi-P&L proposals, preparing sales quotations, planning customer meetings and demonstrating equipment capabilities across diagnostic product portfolio with relevant Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialist and other sales support staff. Ensure order and configuration quality at the point of entry to ensure accuracy, configuration integrity and that all requirements are tied to documented customer inputs. Lead successful negotiation and closure of multi P&L opportunities, interfacing with all key buyer influencers. Assist Product Sales Specialists in negotiation and deal closure of single product deals as required. Promote point of sale service contracts and financing solutions and drive margin through selling value and achieving price targets. GE Product & Market awareness Develop a solid knowledge of GE product and service portfolio and competitors’ products. Develop and maintain expertise of market and technology trends in order to understand customer issues and challenges as well as educating customer on their unmet clinical and business needs. Develop and maintain deep understanding of CxO level business and clinical needs and how GE provide solutions/offerings to meet these needs differently from the competition. Compliance Adhere to and uphold highest standards of compliance to relevant international and local Regulatory and GE Healthcare Promotional Codes Adhere to all applicable GE and GE Healthcare compliance policies, codes and training requirements Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required. 任职条件:  Qualifications / Requirements Education to Bachelor Degree level or the equivalent of four years of sales experience. 2 years of strategic sales experience. 2 years experience in healthcare. Proven key account management and project planning skills. Strong customer focus and desire to continuously improve expertise Well developed listening, influencing, interpersonal and networking skills to drive collaborative culture at all levels; High level presentation skills; able to present ideas to customers in a way that produces understanding and impact. Quality Specific Goals Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required Knowledge and understanding of all Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies Knowledge and understanding of all Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Country / Int’l Law is broken Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System. Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

description: Description Of Position The Retail Strategy manager, part of China Network Strategy team, develops and supports new retail strategies, formats and initiatives as well as the Ford Signature retail design program, defining Ford retailers exterior, interior and in-store CX design. The team works in close collaboration with Global team (Network, Retail / CX and design team) to ensure the consistency Brand fundamentals and exceptional Retail experience, support China P&Ls to transform their retail networks strategies Key Roles and Responsibilities Leading and/or supporting existing or new retail initiatives as part of the ongoing China Retail Network Transformation strategy, including but no limit to showroom short-term and mid-term upgrade solution to support new product launch Supporting Ford Signature 2.0 development with global team with China PoVs, leading the scaling in China Co-work with China CX team to define consumer journey for showroom Retail experience Supporting to develop China showroom digitalization of Online-to-offline experience Providing PoVs for retailers Exterior and Interiors, guide P&Ls for retails formats transformation and showroom upgrades Piloting new retail opportunities in China in partnership with dealers and/or external parties, implementing pilot plans and measure/communicate key learnings Developing business cases to stress test new retail initiatives and potential scaling (including impact on existing business) Selection Criteria Well-rounded experience in marketing, sales and service positions, Reginal & Field experience, experience in customer service, financial service or interface with these is a plus Relevant retail marketing and/or communication / digital experience Strong understanding of the China business model (both Ford and dealer) The incumbent must have proactive can-do attitude, be open minded and curious to business Strong project management experience, results driven strategic thinking Commitment in execution even work under pressure, collaborative way of doing business Bachelor’s degree above Good presentation and communication skills Proficiency in OS applications, especially in PPT Fluent in oral English

description: Huntsman’s PU Elastomers Division is now searching for a Sales Account Manager at Guangzhou. The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving business on the aggressive growth path, penetrate and expand market share of footwear in PU and TPU, Strengthen stakeholder connection in casual and safety shoes field. This role is an individual contributor.  As The Sales Account Manager, You Will Fully comply with PU elastomer policy and EFUS1ON core value Sales budget fulfillment, manage the business to deliver the budget sales volume / value / contribution margin. Business management to exist and potential customers Well organize customer management and identify new business gain and penetrate into new market to expand FW market share under the guidance of sales manager. Business ownership to drive customer growth up and further move up system goods portfolio to cover unmet needs; Work closely with distributors to retain customer relationship and seek new opportunity, regularly review and manage distributor to generate clearly picture for end users’ business; Support market and brand, OEM to build up pipeline on whole value chain, work with cross functional team such as CS, Finance, production and supply chain to follow up order process and improve service quality. Sales plan and strategy and market development pipeline Strongly capability of sales forecast and plan, aggressively driving volume grow up and CM profitability, market, customer and brand focus Translate global and regional growth strategy into constructing short and long term in order to hit sales target in the top line and fulfillment; Further dig out casual and safety shoe business and map out Desma machine in china army boots and create 3-year capture action plan New project generation and trouble shooting Collaborate with TS team, TD team to dig deeply out replacement market and deliver best-class practice to win market trust and covert into order generation; Independently solve tech complaints with limited support and resource Skills And Experiences Required Chemistry or polymer education background (bachelor’s degree minimum) Basic PU knowledge or FW relative application knowledge, more than 7-10 years working experience in chemical field, possess at least 4 years tech service working is preferred FW industry or shoes industry experience, Global and MNC experience preferred. Proven track record of successful account management and profitable business growth. Able to travel frequently (>60% mainly for domestic travel); Good customer relation skills, able to independently solve problem and handle conflict. Good interpersonal and communication skills to influence team and stakeholder. Integrity and highly commitment High level of passion with strong business acumen, Computer skills, written and spoken English Huntsman offers unsurpassed opportunities to build a successful future. Our diverse portfolio creates a range of career fields including manufacturing, research and development, technical services, sales and marketing, customer service – and the list goes on.  Here, you can make an impact and make a difference. Come join us.  Huntsman is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all qualified applicants for employment, without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, gender identification, sexual orientation and/or expression or any other characteristic protected by law in every location in which we have facilities national or local.  Please refer to https : // www . huntsman . com / privacy / online-privacy-notice for Company’s Data Privacy and Protection information.  All unsolicited resumes presented by recruitment agencies are treated as pro bono information or service.  Huntsman is aware of a scam involving fraudulent job offers. Huntsman does not make job offers until after a candidate has submitted a job application and has participated in a face-to-face interview. Please be advised that emails from Huntsman always end in “@huntsman.com” and that any job offer that requires payment or requires you to deposit a check is likely a scam. If you have questions about any open positions at Huntsman, please visit our Careers website at  http : / /www . huntsman . com / corporate / a / Careers.

Job Responsibilities: • Assists Supply Chain team in receiving international forecasts, sending order confirmations, and other sales input. • Communicates consistently with customers and internal departments to coordinate with forecasting, orders, new product development and other requests. • Provide sales analysis and business review support. • Answers and distributes international email inquiries. • Assist with the development of new customers and maintaining of old customers. • Assist in International trade shows and coordinates International Business travel. • Assist with other projects as assigned. Extensive Microsoft Office skills.ioritize work

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Job Responsibility Revenue, bookings and growth targets overachieved and growth faster than market average and peer companies. Accurate short and long term sales forecasts are established and maintained. Inventory strategy and VMI plan (if appropriate) developed and executed with the BU Division and manufacturing team. Strategic account plans are developed and implemented to maximize II-VI market share. Relationships with key decision makers globally at Tier 1 accounts are built and maintained. Support design-in activity by working with PLM, R&D team in key customers; coordinate the communication between customers with II-VI team (PLM, R&D and management team). Develop and approve long term customer strategy with customer and II-VI stakeholders. Frequent travel to customer sites to meet with key personnel; maintain high intimacy relationship with customers’ R&D, PLM, sourcing and buyer team as well as operation and quality team, adopt a matrix communication/relationship with key customers. Support CSR to communicate with customers and its contract manufacturers for the delivery update, pull in/pull out request. Job Requirements Bachelor’s degree with Technical or Engineering focus preferred or MBA. Minimum 5+ years sales experience with a proven track record of effective account management. Strong sales/relationship Tier 1 management or global account management. Good understanding of client’s business and ability to create a winning value proposition to address client needs. Ability to establish relationships with customer within C-Level, R&D engineering, product line management, supply chain, manufacturing and quality. Excellent contract negotiation skills. Ability to excel in a cross-organizational, cross-cultural, global team environment spanning multiple time zones. Ability to maintain and analyze critical market/technological developments to evaluate opportunities and risks and communicate updates to the organization. Ability to travel up to 50% of the time, including international travel.

Careers that Change Lives  A Day in the Life  Responsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assigned. Promotes and sells Medtronic's products and services within an assigned geographic area and /or specific customer accounts to meet or exceed sales targets. Responsible for developing, building, and strengthening long-term relationships with stakeholders including distributors and healthcare professionals. Responsible for pursuing leads, assessing needs and providing product services to maximize the benefits derived from Medtronic's products and/or services. Promotes and establishes education of the company's products and/or services. Conducts market research including customers and competitors activities. Implements market development plans/strategies and changes as needed. Communicates customer feedback on new products and/or modifications to existing products or applications to internal stakeholders including R&D, Operations and Marketing. Must Have: Minimum Requirements Bachelors degree required Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience and working knowledge of company products and services Nice to Have  About Medtronic  Together, we can change healthcare worldwide. At Medtronic, we push the limits of what technology, therapies and services can do to help alleviate pain, restore health and extend life. We challenge ourselves and each other to make tomorrow better than yesterday. It is what makes this an exciting and rewarding place to be.  We want to accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations - but we will only succeed with the right people on our team. Let’s work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients’ lives. Help us shape the future.  Physical Job Requirements  The physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. For Office Roles: While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to be independently mobile. The employee is also required to interact with a computer, and communicate with peers and co-workers. Contact your manager or local HR to understand the Work Conditions and Physical requirements that may be specific to each role. (ADA-United States of America)  Additional Information Posting Date: Aug 23, 2021 Travel: No
industries: Medical Devices, Hospital & Health Care, and Pharmaceuticals

description: Job Description:  ·      Proactively scope the technical solutions required to address customer requirements and challenges, assess customers’ met and unmet needs, and recommends solutions that optimize value for the customer and Hanshow; Monitor deal progress from a pre-sales perspective and keep an open eye on how solutions can be maximized in customer and commercial value; 主动确定解决客户需求所需的技术解决方案的范围，评估客户满足和未满足的需求，并推荐能为客户和汉朔优化价值的解决方案；从售前的角度监控交易进度，并关注如何最大程度地提高客户和商业价值的解决方案持； ·      Facilitate and provide workshops, as well as create high Level visionary demos and building and validating value scenarios as well as selling and communicating concepts. Present solution, capabilities and credentials in proposal defense meetings and customer discussions; 促进和提供研讨会，创建高水平、有远见的演示，并建立和验证价值方案以及销售和交流概念。在提案答辩会议和客户讨论中提供解决方案，功能和凭据； ·      Deliver RFx responses and create customer proposals and POC; 传递RFx响应并制作客户proposals和POC； ·      Pro-actively build and keep knowledge and skills up to date; 主动建立并保持知识和技能的最新状态； ·      Coordinate closely with sales and service resources to align solution design with customers’ business requirements; Enable the sales team to position Infrastructure management services solution proactively; 与内部销售，销售支持和服务资源紧密协调，以使解决方案设计与客户的业务需求保持一致；使销售团队能够主动定位基础架构管理服务解决方案； ·      Meet assigned targets for profitable sales growth in assigned product lines, market areas, channel, or teams supported; 在分配的产品线，市场区域，渠道或支持的团队中实现分配的利润增长目标； ·      Provide coaching and professional development to team members and pre-sales associates in order to enhance their product knowledge, technical acumen, and technical sales skills. 为团队成员售前同事提供指导和专业发展，以增强他们的产品知识，技术敏锐度和技术销售技能。  Job Qualifications: ·      At least Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Electronics, Telecommunication or related fields; 至少具有计算机科学，电子，电信或相关领域的本科学位； ·      From 3 – 5 years of related experience; 3-5年相关经验； ·      As we attentive to your work-life balance, we offer flexible work rules (depending on your function) and we will ensure the well-being and safety of our employees; 考虑到您的工作与生活的平衡，我们提供灵活的，远程办公（取决于您的工作安排），并确保员工的健康和安全； ·      Commonly use Gantt charts, MySQL, Microsoft tools such as MS project, MS excel, MS power point, MS Visio etc.; 熟练地使用甘特图，MySQL，Microsoft工具（例如MS Projects，MS excel，MS Power Point，MS Visio等软件； ·      Have at least one of skills in Linux operating system except Windows, and have relevant experience; 掌握Windows以外的Linux操作系统中至少一种技能，并具有相关经验； ·      You are dynamic, stress-resistant and a team player; 您是充满活力，抗压和团队合作精神的人； ·      You can coordinate multiple projects at the same time and are good at assessing risks; 您可以同时协调多个项目，并且擅长评估风险； ·      Ability to participate in multi-lingual meetings, good communication skills; 能够参加多语言会议，具有良好的沟通能力； ·      Language: Chinese, English, Spanish (only for South America) 语言：中文，英语，西班牙语（只针对南美区） ·      Have the ability to build and expand the network with customers; 与客户建立和扩展网络的能力； ·      Have project management skills to drive initiatives to the required outcome; 拥有推动计划取得所需成果的项目管理技巧； ·      You love and understanding for technology; 对技术的热爱与理解； ·      Have eagerness to Learn. 拥有学习的热情； ·      Driving license is preferred 拥有驾照的优先。  About Hanshow：  Founded in 2012, Hanshow is a leading provider of ESL and smart store solutions serving traditional retail, new retail, pharmacies, department stores, fashion, health care, and the entertainment industries, etc. We provide ESL and smart store solutions in 12,000+ stores in 50+ countries. Hanshow is a trusted partner among retailers worldwide. We strive to enhance the shopping experience by developing cutting edge technology and providing services to solve our clients' in-store challenges. Our innovative spirit begins with our global team, improves the way we operate, and ultimately helps us deliver compelling end-to-end solutions.   汉朔(Hanshow)是全球领先的数字化门店解决方案提供商，具备自主研发创新、软硬件方案集成及全产业链资源整合的能力。公司成立于2012年，总部位于浙江嘉兴，研发与管理中心位于北京，主要服务于传统零售、新零售、百货时尚、医药健康、文化娱乐等领域。随着零售行业多元化发展，汉朔基于对零售及互联网领域变革的深刻理解，始终坚持以创新与研发为核心驱动，通过提供数字化、高效率、重体验的门店解决方案及服务，帮助客户建立核心竞争优势。 目前，汉朔已为全球超过50个国家和地区、12000多家门店提供电子价签产品及数字化门店解决方案，国内零售百强占有率超60%。   Website: https://www.hanshow.com/ Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/hanshow

description: We are the global test and automation specialists, powering next-generation technologies through sophisticated solutions. Behind every electronic device you use, Teradyne's test technology ensures your device works right the first time, every time! Our portfolio of automation solutions help manufacturers to develop and deliver products quickly, efficiently and cost-effectively. Together, Teradyne companies deliver manufacturing automation across industries and applications around the world!.  Responsibilities Develop the strategic direction for the combined sales, application and service team, achieve bookings targets for product and services, win all major strategic design-ins, increase our market share and margins and improve the productivity and cost efficiency across the customer team. Establish personal relationships with key decision makers at customers and their subcontractors. Provide input to key strategic decisions concerning resource prioritization, pricing, positioning, product marketing, engineering road-maps and differentiation. Maintain and permanently improve the overall engineering process between defined customer and Teradyne. Qualifications/Skills A minimum of 5 - 8 years of working experience in sales or account management in the semiconductor related industry. Requires a bachelor’s degree or above in Electrical Engineering or related field. Engineering technical background is highly preferred. Excellent communication skills. Ability to interact with customers’ engineering and business staff at all levels. Proven track record in achieving/exceeding sales and market share targets. Solid experience in building and managing a major sales account, preferably in semiconductor capital equipment. Strong communication and presentation skills as well as interpersonal skills. description: Senior Sales Specialist – Shanghai  Location: Shanghai  Department: AsiaPac Analytics - HK & North Asia  The Portfolio Analytics Group is responsible for the company’s portfolio and quantitative analytic applications. Typically, the primary market for these products is Investment Managers, but certainly any organization with a portfolio management or quantitative analytics component could also be considered a prospective client.  The ideal candidate will be highly technical, intellectually curious, possess strong interpersonal and presentation skills and be motivated to help FactSet maintain its position as the market leader in the portfolio, quant and risk analytics space.  Primary Responsibilities Help drive new business and achieve sales targets for the year Become an expert in portfolio management, risk analytics and quant workflows along with FactSet’s corresponding product offering Defend and drive revenue across user base Manage client engagement and relationships Travel extensively to meet with clients and prospects in China As part of the Group, the successful applicant will be expected to work towards a personal and group target, contributing across the board as regards client contact, internal & external training and product development and awareness. The job will include product demonstration and product trial management, cross-group presentations and conference attendance.  Requirements Native Mandarin speaker and fluent in English Minimum 5 years’ experience working in or selling to the buy-side. Demonstrate ability to identify new prospects, and build and maintain solid client relationships Good knowledge of investment management workflows, applications and challenges Willingness to learn portfolio applications, the underlying calculations and related theories Independent worker who will take initiative in all aspects of the role Excellent communication and presentation skills Willingness and ability to travel Strong coding skills is a plus CFA charter candidate is a plus

description: BASF has been a committed partner to Greater China since 1885. With large production sites in Shanghai, Nanjing and Chongqing, as well as a global and regional research and development hub in Shanghai, BASF is a major foreign investor in the country’s chemical industry. BASF posted sales of approximately €8.5 billion in 2020 to customers in Greater China and employed 8,948 people as of the end of the year. For further information, please visit www.basf.com/cn/en.  Objectives Conduct and coordinate Hygiene products sales and key account management activities in south of China Develop new business in south of China in line with China sales team frameworks Manage the contact matrix ensuring that all potential points of contact and influence are being served appropriately Main Tasks Ability to understand and anticipate area customer’s needs in depth and communicate this within team and own organization for account strategy development Plan, develop and implement area market and account strategies in line with China sales team frameworks, marketing and business concepts as well as product and service portfolios for the accounts Formulate or implement the operative pricing policy and plan the sales volume. Negotiate prices and terms Manage the interfaces between product management team, supply chain team and BYC team as required, ensure account satisfaction to the largest extent Leading/ support the new business development in south of China to expand the customers base and deliver solid business results Conduct sales forecast (incl. imports and local production). Monitor inventories and ensure timely collection of receivables Provide area market investigation and short & long term area business development strategy suggestion to China sales management team Drive decision making process for growth achievement with a focus on volume & cCM1 Cooperate with technical service team to serve and development products as customers’ needs, and solve the customer problems Requirements Education: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in chemistry, business or related discipline Working Experience: Minimum 5 years’ relevant working experience in account management, technical service preferably in hygiene industry Strong understanding of the hygiene industry Fluent in English and excellent presentation skills Primary Location  CN-Guangdong-Guangzhou  Other Locations  CN-Shanghai-Shanghai  Job  Sales / Technical Sales  Ongoing  For BASF, diversity is one of the essential keys to business success and the well-being of our employees. We promote an inclusive culture that accepts the diversity of people, experiences and capabilities. Join the team and connect with more than 117,000 other minds. Stay alert for possible recruitment fraud!  This can include fake websites, fake job offers, or contact from a person falsely claiming to represent BASF.

description: 工作职责:  Job Description Summary  You will be responsible for developing and implementing a sales plan for assigned channel/distributor aimed at achieving and exceeding sales turnover and financial return, within the most cost-effective route and time-frame. Target new business accounts and opportunities as well as existing customers.GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Job Description  Primary Responsibilities: Develop and implement a sales plan for assigned channel/distributor aimed at achieving and exceeding sales turnover and financial return, within the most cost-effective route and time-frame. Target new business accounts and opportunities as well as existing customers Actively manage the relationship with the assigned distributor to ensure alignment with company objectives Proceed distributor/channel with the support & information needed to facilitate their effectiveness Developing and managing regional KOL, build regional product strategy Maintain a high level of technical and commercial competence on relevant products, techniques and applications. Accurately forecast sales and growth opportunities within designated territory. Prepare and participate in business reviews/forecasts for Regional Sales Management, to ensure a constant flow of information between Channel/Distributor and the Company. Maintain an awareness of competitor activities and developments and ensure that this information is collected and made available to the Regional Sales Manager. Actively track market dynamics including competition situations, customer needs, product evolutions and formulate analysis report to aid business forecast and planning for business decision. Keep close contact with key luminaries within assigned territory, to promote latest product and clinical development from GE Healthcare, collect first hand customer feedback and needs on GE products/services and build the spokesman for GE. Generate record and maintain customer profiles, including keeping track of key decision makers. 任职条件:  Qualifications Required Minimum 2 years relevant healthcare industry experience or minimum 3 years customer management experience Bachelor's degree or a minimum of 3 years of account management/development experience. A proven track-record of achieving and exceeding sales targets, and a desire to grow new business Experience and understanding customer needs and business drivers and using this knowledge to develop account plans and strategies (knowledge of the existing account areas/channels would be advantageous). Excellent interpersonal skills including, teamworking skills and good communication skills Persistence and tenacity in developing prospects and customers, and able to close business Strong presentation, analytical and customer service skills Self-starter able to manage time and organize and prioritize workload Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.

description: 2022 Global Management Trainee(GMT) Program Location: Shanghai/上海   Program Information  We can only grow at the pace of our talent. The GMT program will prepare you for a fast-track career at Budweiser APAC. It’s part of our drive to recruit, develop & retain people better than ourselves. We believe in investing in our future leaders today. Through an intensive rotational training program, in-depth exposure to our business operations, and relevant experiences right from the beginning, our program is designed to fast-track the careers of future leaders and change-makers. The GMT program takes place over 15-18 months. Throughout the program, GMTs will gain a 360 view of the business while holding roles in both our Supply (Brewery) and Commercial (Sales & Marketing) organizations, as well as flexing creative and analytical muscles through project work in an area of interest.  Our GMT Program Highlights: Rotational Program To develop a deep understanding of our business, you will be immersed into functional areas such as Sales & Marketing, and Operations & Logistics during a 15-18 months period. Global Induction Your experience will begin with an induction to our company’s culture, vision, and strategy. You’ll join other trainees from around the world and meet our CEO and senior leaders. On-the-Job Experience We know you are a high-achiever and want to be allowed to have a real impact on our business. Being a GMT, you will be able to achieve this from day one. Fast Career Growth with Senior Leadership Exposure  Your training is just the foundation. Your first role is where you’ll make a difference, and the rest of your career at Budweiser APAC is where you will leave your mark and have an impact. From entry-level to Zone President, everyone has a seat at the table and is expected to bring their best every single day.   Qualifications  You’ll need to be ambitious, curious, bold, and resilient, ready to take on tough challenges, and be determined to deliver results. We’re looking for a global mindset and a desire to connect with people at all levels. We prize a sense of ownership and a desire to make an impact. You own your future, and the speed of your career growth will depend on your talent, efforts, and results.  Minimum Requirements: Students graduating between August 1, 2021, and July 31st, 2022 in China or between January 1, 2021 to July 31, 2022 for students studying overseas; Bachelor degree at least, preferably in Science, Technology, Engineering, Business or related degree; Work authorization in the country for which application is being submitted Geographical mobility High proficiency in both written and oral English Quickly adapt to the new environment  Ideal Profile: Innovative and strategic Strong data analytical and logical skills Cross-functional interest Ambitious and self-driven Adaptive, comfortable with ambiguity Ability to effectively manage several projects at the same time Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment Strong leadership and influencing skills  Employment Type Full-time
industries: Consumer Goods, Food & Beverages, and Wine and Spirits

description: Snap Inc. is a camera company. We believe that reinventing the camera represents our greatest opportunity to improve the way people live and communicate. Our products empower people to express themselves, live in the moment, learn about the world, and have fun together.  We’re looking for an Agency Development Lead - China to join Team Snapchat! You will be responsible for developing and implementing our commercial strategy for the Chinese advertising market. You’ll collaborate with cross-functional teams within Snap, as well as external partners, to grow advertising sales in China.  What you’ll do:  Develop and implement Snap’s commercial strategy for China, in particular through partnership with Snap sales agencies in the market Build and manage relationships with Sales agencies, including assisting in the contract and negotiations process, quota setting, and ongoing performance management Coach agencies to effectively deliver Snap’s narrative and product positioning, the ad offerings for best market and customer fit Enable agency success through detailed training, resources, and thought leadership Develop metrics to measure the growth and performance of the book of business under agencies, and inform leadership about trends and opportunities Grow agency business via driving strategic initiatives, product adoption and business growth across the portfolio of agency accounts. Become an expert in your market or region with deep knowledge about the key players (both platforms and customers), local customs, and regional trends Deliver on quarterly revenue and goals for your market(s)    Minimum Qualifications:   BA/BS degree or equivalent 5 to 8 years in media sales, media buying, partner management, management consulting, digital advertising and/or equivalent digital marketing roles Strong knowledge of the Chinese advertising landscape (especially export advertising) Proven track record of reaching and exceeding revenue goals    Preferred Qualifications:  Strong analytical skills with a “feel” for numbers  Experience in export retail & gaming industry Ability to engage and partner with C-Level/VP level executives Excellent communication and presentation skills Ability to manage multiple projects at once  Passionate about Snapchat and up for the challenge of building something from the ground up

At the BMW Group, everything starts with passion. It turns a profession into a vocation. It drives us to keep reinventing mobility and bring innovative ideas onto the roads. Enthusiasm for joint projects turns a team into a strong unit where every opinion is valued. It is only when expertise, highly professional processes and enjoyment of work unite that we can shape the future together.      This position will be responsible for supporting to ensure the success of the current MINI product portfolio, ensuring the success of the current MINI product line lifecycle management; fulfilling market dynamic product substance demands and dealer request, monitoring and analyzing market competition and customer preference; implementing local sales literature/specification for the Chinese market and manage key elements of the operational side of Product Management function including the set-up and maintenance dealer ordering system (OKA / PCASO ) for new model set-up and on-going maintenance; monitoring take rates of models and packages and looking into proposal how to optimize contribution margin from this area.     What awaits you?  - Responsible for the current line-up to identify necessary product content & features (both series and options) including forecasting take rates, defining lifecycle P&P activities align with volume planning and sales targets, as well as marketing activities.  (e.g. comprehensive proposal including Competition analysis, option profile, pricing, volume and business case, LCI requirements, definition of special edition, etc..). As well as dealer communication on product updates.  - Management of the budget of MINI Product Management Department. MINI specification sheet and sales literature (digital versions and printed) content, and translation responsibility. Market competition monitoring and reporting e.g. sales reporting's, transaction prices UKL segment. Steering and preparation of presentation to top management  - Manage and maintain the MINI vehicle ordering systems for MINI China. Conduct continually market observation, analysis and evaluation of product comparison for MINI based on competitor performance analysis, competitor product study.  - Ensure accurate and structured maintenance of live dealer ordering systems (OKA / PCASO / ) for new model set-up and ongoing maintenance. As well as communicate/guide dealers and regions to get all relevant information from central team related to the updates. Propose proper market specific requirement together with relevant colleagues for product strategic requirements.  - Provide MINI product knowledge and product marketing support to ensure the process of MINI Marketing/PR/Training/Sales ordering. (e.g. product launch timing, profile plan, price positioning, competitor’s information, etc.)     Qualifications and experience.  - Economics/Commerce (with marketing focus) or technical university degree or mechanical engineering/education with supplementary professional experience in the other subject each; experience in the automotive industry.  - Fluent(spoken/written) English and Mandarin. Very good MS office knowledge(Excel, PowerPoint, Word)  - Strong analyzing and structuring skills as well as presentation skills. Profound knowledge. Strong and mature personality, team spirit, good interpersonal skills.  - Driving license.  - 1-3 Years working experience; international experience/working in an international company; OEM Product marketing or consulting firm experience is a plus.     You are ready to join our fun team and ready to light your inspiration? Apply now!

Assist team whenever required in the selling process or in any other operation Ensure the store operation standard of his/her perimeter: stock management, after service, maintenance, CRM Monitor stock situation and ensure the operation standard of own perimeter to support sales & service Product In charge of several métiers/product categories in terms of sales, visual merchandising, inventory control, training, etc. Be responsible for market updates and give buying advises to store manager People development and team management Manage and coach the team: set objectives and assess performance, observe team on the floor and provide ongoing feedback and coaching based on their needs Motivate team member with individual recognition via sales results, métier management, customer relationship management Motivate teams, create a sense of team spirit, discipline and mutual respect, as well as dedication and loyalty to the company, recognize individual and team efforts Ensure teams receive proper training regularly to develop customer service, product knowledge, selling skills and other skills for personal development Profile Tertiary educated with at least 6 years of relevant management experience in high-end fashion, luxury industry or in similar capacity. Strong business sales sense with solid analytical skills. Ability to lead and drive performance and customer service. Good customer relationship management skills. Excellent spoken and written English and Chinese. French is a plus. Must be a good team player, pleasant, service oriented and self motivated. Strong leadership, interpersonal and communication skills. Hands on computer knowledge of MS office.

Orgainize and train dealers in the region to develop the market, including visiting key customers, developing target customers in order to achieve the regional sales target.  2. Communicate with dealers about sales policies and company strategies and to participate and guide their implemenation to ensure the rapid implementation of the company’s sales policies.  3. Develop and maintain channel and end user resources in the region.  4. Responsible for the information collection of major competitors in the regional market to ensure that the company's decision makers have a more rapid market response  5. Organize or cooperate with the Marketing Department to carry out marketing activities such as exhibitions, academic conferences and new product launches  6. College degree or above, major in medical equipment or medicine is preferred  2. With 3 years above sales experience in government field with experience in channel sales management and end customer management  3. Good communication skill  4. Good English and computer skills

SUCCEED IN OUR  Experienced Team  INEOS Styrolution is the leading global styrenics supplier, with a focus on styrene monomer, polystyrene, ABS Standard and styrenic specialties. With world-class production facilities and more than 90 years of experience, INEOS Styrolution helps its customers succeed by offering innovative and sustainable best-in-class solutions, designed to give them a competitive edge in their markets, and at the same time, help make the circular economy for styrenics a reality. The company provides styrenic applications for many everyday products across a broad range of industries, including automotive, electronics, household, construction, healthcare, packaging and toys/sports/leisure. In 2019, sales were at 5 billion euros. INEOS Styrolution employs approximately 3,600 people and operates 20 production sites in ten countries.  We are looking for a  Sales Account Manager  Shanghai , China (CN)   Purpose /Role of the job： Supports the global/regional key account business/transplants in East China. Maintain key account sales & service within the territory. Business develop in Key accounts, explore new business opportunity; develop Electronics & Household customers and new applications to achieve even beyond the existing sales target.   Environment/Context/Complexity of the job: Internal: Account managers, CSO, Plant QC, R&D, Technical Managers, RHQ External: Customers, compounding service providers, distributors, test centers, Associations  Responsibilities/ Accountabilities of the job: Key Result Areas : East China Key account business activity Major Activities Operational actions for E&H EC and global key account local support. Develops & reviews contractual agreements, supply chain & product flow concepts & service - partner management for E&H business. Outcome  Deliver annual target CM1 result at premium margins and direct/guide local E&H key account managers. Key Result Areas : Maintain existing business (East China) Major Activities Communication with existing customers and regular visit to ensure order collection follow customers’ inquires Maintain all technical and service record and case history on customer sales. Maintain good relationship with customer related key persons to stable business share Outcome  Achieve target of sales volume and profit Key Result Areas : Business Development (East China) Major Activities Work with Key account managers to scout the market trend to seek new business chances both for customers and Styrolution. Coordinate customers' seminars to promote new products and solutions from Styrolution. Contact related industry associations to collect market and industry information Identify and visit potential customers and lead the development process until business achieved Outcome  Open up new business successfully Key Result Areas : Technical consultant Major Activities Verify the customers’ complaint on site, and contact internal and external related parties to lead the whole process until problems solved. Serve customers’ concern such as material selection, process optimization, mould optimization, etc. Manage local compounding service providers in the region to ensure them delivering qualified service and products to end customers Outcome  Solve customers’ technical related issues and achieve sales target Key Result Areas : Reporting Major Activities Obtain, update and evaluate market of responsible customer/industry on time sales activity report, forecast or any requested report accurately and punctually GKA business support and reporting. Outcome  Make management understanding market / customers for decision making   Required profile: Level Of Education & Knowledge Bachelor degree, preferably Polymer Science and Engineering Experience In General Min. 5 years in plastics industry related technical service, business development etc. Preferably having work experience in an international company Technical Skills Fundamental knowledge about polymers and polymerization process Plastics processing trouble shooting. Fluent in English and Chinese, both writing and speaking Competencies, Behavioral Skills Strong customer focus Very good negotiation skills Good interpersonal and presentation skills For more information please contact Sally Lu.  INEOS Styrolution Polymers (Shanghai) Co. Ltd., 25F, Central Towers, 567 Langao Road - Putuo District, Shanghai 200333, P.R.China  #Business Management

该职位来源于猎聘  Approach potential clients and develop a business model with operation team; (ODM;ODM+…)  接洽潜在客户，与运营团队一起开发业务模式;(ODM; ODM +…)  Working with project team to get satisfied quote and maintain customer relationship;  与项目团队合作，获取满意的报价，维护客户关系;  Develop different sales channel such as Link-in; Kickstart; Web or exhibition…  开发不同销售渠道，如Link-in;启动;Web或展览……  Achieve annual sales revenue through various sales channel;  通过各种销售渠道实现年度销售收入目标  Maintain existing customers; working with CS team to constitute achieve CSC(Customer Satisfy Score)  维护现有客户;与CS团队合作，完成CSC(客户满意度)  Maintain a health AR status with customer.  维护每一个客户健康的应收账款  任职要求：  BS degree or above,at least 3 years sales experience in “Direct Marketing”, “eCommerce”or“Sales”fields .  本科及以上学历，至少3年直销、电子商务或销售领域的销售经验。  Excellent business sense and creative thinking with teamwork spirit  优秀的商业意识和创新思维，具有团队合作精神  Solid knowledge of PowerPoint，Word， Excel and Project Programs .  对PowerPoint,Word, Excel和项目程序有扎实的了解。  Knowledge of contractual procedures to affirm elements for implementation .  对合同要素及程序知识有所了解。  Excellent skills in spoken and written English, with open and professional communication style capable of doing presentation in English .  优秀的英语口语和书面表达能力，具有开放、专业的沟通风格，能用英语进行演讲。  Strong hands on work ethic and highly energetic with the ability to creatively solve customer’s technical and business needs.  ？具有良好的职业道德和高度的工作热情，能够创造性地解决客户的技术和业务需求。

工作职责:  Job Description Summary  As a Senior Account Sales, you will develop & implement One GE Healthcare sales strategy by maintaining commercial relationships/alliances with Accounts at zone level, e.g. hospitals, hospital groups, government bodies or Group Purchasing Organizations. It's a role that will be responsible for maintaining a detailed understanding of assigned accounts’ business and keeping GE Healthcare Zone, Region & Product management informed and appropriately involved. You will be expected to lead & close multimodality and single product deals in their assigned accounts.  GE Healthcare is a leading global medical technology and digital solutions innovator. Our mission is to improve lives in the moments that matter. Unlock your ambition, turn ideas into world-changing realities, and join an organization where every voice makes a difference, and every difference builds a healthier world.  Primary Responsibilities  Financial Performance Achieve sales and orders volumes at the target prices in assigned accounts/territory. Coordinate orders and sales forecasts within the applicable sales funnel tools and reports for in their assigned territory/accounts in conjunction with Product Sales Specialist/product Specialists. Account Management Maintain relationships, develop a business strategy, and maximize business opportunities for all GE Healthcare businesses, products & services within allocated accounts/territory (or within defined care area/department scope). Represent OneGEHC in the account or care area/department and acts as a primary customer point of contact in the allocated accounts/territory. Provide on-going feedback to management, product teams, services and marketing. Maintain Go-to-Market plans in conjunction with Zone cross functional and multi-product teams to achieve targets and grow GE’s share of customer investments in capital, diagnostics and operational expenditures. Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through consistent high quality interactions with customer management. Build long term strategic alliance with portfolio of accounts to continue to add value, and promote Service offerings to identify and escalate commercial service needs to drive customer NPS. In cooperation with Product teams and Marketing, drive One GE Healthcare promotional events in assigned territory. Be aware of customer segmentation and promote offerings relevant to each client’s segment. Opportunity Management Prospecting for new customers and business opportunities in addition to growing and maintaining the existing customer portfolio. Prioritize new leads to create a balanced sales funnel for future sales. Lead and leverage Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialists, Care Area or Category Leaders, Service Operations and other Company resources to provide the necessary technical, clinical and business content to create a competitive differentiation. Coordinate One GE Healthcare team on assigned accounts in order to deliver solutions that meet or exceed customer expectations. Lead & coordinate multi-P&L proposals, preparing sales quotations, planning customer meetings and demonstrating equipment capabilities across diagnostic product portfolio with relevant Product Sales Specialists, Product Specialist and other sales support staff. Ensure order and configuration quality at the point of entry to ensure accuracy, configuration integrity and that all requirements are tied to documented customer inputs. Lead successful negotiation and closure of multi P&L opportunities, interfacing with all key buyer influencers. Assist Product Sales Specialists in negotiation and deal closure of single product deals as required. Promote point of sale service contracts and financing solutions and drive margin through selling value and achieving price targets. GE Product & Market awareness Develop a solid knowledge of GE product and service portfolio and competitors’ products. Develop and maintain expertise of market and technology trends in order to understand customer issues and challenges as well as educating customer on their unmet clinical and business needs. Develop and maintain deep understanding of CxO level business and clinical needs and how GE provide solutions/offerings to meet these needs differently from the competition. Compliance Adhere to and uphold highest standards of compliance to relevant international and local Regulatory and GE Healthcare Promotional Codes Adhere to all applicable GE and GE Healthcare compliance policies, codes and training requirements Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required. 任职条件:  Qualifications / Requirements Education to Bachelor Degree level or the equivalent of four years of sales experience. 2 years of strategic sales experience. 2 years experience in healthcare. Proven key account management and project planning skills. Strong customer focus and desire to continuously improve expertise Well developed listening, influencing, interpersonal and networking skills to drive collaborative culture at all levels; High level presentation skills; able to present ideas to customers in a way that produces understanding and impact. Quality Specific Goals Aware of and comply with the GEHC Quality Manual, Quality Management System, Quality Management Policy, Quality Goals, and applicable laws and regulations as they apply to this job type/position Complete all planned Quality & Compliance training within the defined deadlines Identify and report any quality or compliance concerns and take immediate corrective action as required Knowledge and understanding of all Global Privacy and Anti-Competition Policies Knowledge and understanding of all Environmental Health Policies (including but not limited to GE Healthcare EHS Policies, GE Healthcare Fleet Rules, etc.) and operate within them to ensure that no company policy or Country / Int’l Law is broken Drive continuous improvement on all related processes, work instructions, and procedures to ensure ongoing standardization and simplification of the Quality Management System. Inclusion and Diversity  GE Healthcare is an Equal Opportunity Employer where inclusion matters. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.  We expect all employees to live and breathe our behaviors: to act with humility and build trust; lead with transparency; deliver with focus, and drive ownership – always with unyielding integrity.  Our total rewards are designed to unlock your ambition by giving you the boost and flexibility you need to turn your ideas into world-changing realities. Our salary and benefits are everything you’d expect from an organization with global strength and scale, and you’ll be surrounded by career opportunities in a culture that fosters care, collaboration and support.
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Information Technology and Services, and Financial Services

jobTitle: Sales Executive II, Central & West China
location: Oil Field Orchard Team, Hubei, China
description: Location:  Field Based, CN  Brand: RS Components  Function: Sales  Role Purpose  Responsibility for optimising sales income from assigned portfolios, an RS Key Account Manager strives to become the first point of contact for a customer to address all their purchasing and service requirements. Primary focus is on building effective relationships within a specified group of key accounts to gain a clear understanding of current and future needs and drive significant incremental sales.  Key Accountabiities  To effectively use the RS value proposition to differentiate RS from our competitors in the minds of their contacts; Provide solutions to meet customer needs by the implementation of relevant and cost-effective value added services ; Partner with Internal Sales closely to identify and build up clients’ needs and strategy to achieve company goals in responsible field ； Develop and execute sales plan for key accounts ； Maintain and further grow exiting customers, while developing new markets to expand business mainly via off line, such as frequent customer visit, or organize customer onsite Roadshow and/or In-House Seminar for contacts expansion and cross-selling, especially for RS Pro brand and/or Anchor Supplier Brands ; Maintain accurate customer records, and can well leverage CRM database as one of the key channels to main and manage sales; Work closely with Internal Sales & Technical Support to develop specific accounts, quotation and fulfill orders ； Work with Customer Service to provide excellent customer service experience, and to raise customer satisfaction rate (NPS); To continually expand relevant technical knowledge and to develop an understanding of the RS product and service portfolio, their application in key areas and the benefits they provide to customers. Complete any other top-down task from company, such as participating product training, marketing campaign, CI projects, EH&S, and etc.; Responsible for AR collection with support from finance team; Share best practice across the business in order to support the activities of the team whilst achieving individual goals and targets. Provide monthly reports to include data on performance against sales targets and key metrics Issue, follow up and convert profitable quotations  Person Specification  5-10 years sales experience in MRO or Electronics industry with vision on industry development; Result driven, target-oriented, diligent with self-motivated to finish field billing target; Accept frequent travel and work under pressure; Strong verbal and written communication skill and a good team player; Familiar with software tool like excel, PPT, ERP (CRM, SAP, 销售易 ), etc.; Technical background is preferred, or equivalent approved experience working with customer technical peer. English: CET 6 preferred College degree or above

jobTitle: Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , Hubei
description: Work is no longer a place. It’s what you do. And how you do it. More fluid, more flexible, powered by your imagination and by some amazing technology! That’s where we come in. We’re Poly. We’re a global outfitter of pro-grade audio and video technology so that employees everywhere can look and sound their best from anywhere. Join us as we pursue our disruptive vision to bring professional audio and video meeting technology and services to everyone. Be a part of our journey!  As an Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , (ICAM) you will work as part of our APAC Inside Sales Team. You will workwithin a defined geographical territory, ( Mainland China) and initiate, own and close sales opportunities on Products and New Service through interacting with a nominated set of Poly Channel Partners , as well as being responsible for the successful on-boarding, development and retention of such Partners.  You will be expected to generate and drive a sufficient pipeline of deals to ensure financial targets are met.  The role requires an active cooperation with multiple departments in Poly and so relationship building, and people skills are essential.  主要职责： 根据公司业务方向，开拓三四级城市渠道 渠道认证：渠道客户的选择、认证； 新产品上市的渠道规划与沟通； 管理负责渠道中 Poly耳机音频和视频业务，完成公司销售目标 完成负责渠道的策略和任务规划 善于利用和整合资源，促进不同团队合作，共同高效完成业绩目标 职位要求： 有一定的 IT 行业渠道销售经验优先 优秀的沟通、协作、谈判能力 勤奋，能够在快节奏的环境中工作和成长 2 年以上相关销售工作经验 全日制本科及以上学历，英语可作为工作语言优先 Our Culture  At Poly, leadership principles aren't just something we talk about, they're something we live and breathe. We believe in creating a work environment where people feel empowered, supported, and included –where trust and transparency are built into the way we work - where creativity, curiosity, and continuous improvement are encouraged and nurtured every day. C3 – Customer. Customer. Customer: Customer obsession is everyone’s job. You enjoy solving customers’ problems - big or small. You work closely with customers, channel partners and their teams to deliver innovative solutions. Raise the Bar: You take pride in your work and know details matter. You know that shavings make a pile. You seek every opportunity to continuously improve teams, products, and processes. Communicate Courageously: You speak with candor but aren't a jerk. You constructively challenge your teammates to get to the best possible outcome or decision. Once a decision is made, you fully align and stay aligned. Onward and Upward: You learn from the past but focus on the future. You rapidly adapt to changes in the marketplace. You help to create solutions that move the company forward with energy, momentum, and results. Own It: You know your business, your customers, and your team – inside and out. You don't sacrifice long-term value for short-term results. You act with integrity, spend money like it’s your own, and put Poly first. Take the Leap: Speed matters in business. You encourage and require those around you to think strategically and act decisively. Poly values calculated risk taking. Ride Together: We are one team. We do what we say we’ll do, we treat each other with respect, we have each other’s back, and we hold each other accountable. Leaders Lead: You know you are part of a larger global community and make decisions as good stewards of the earth, its resources and its people. Our Commitment as an Equal Opportunity Employer  All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity or expression, race, age, religious creed, national origin, physical or mental disability, ancestry, color, marital status, sexual orientation, military or veteran status, status as a victim of domestic violence, sexual assault or stalking, medical condition, genetic information, accessibility needs, or any other protected class or category recognized by applicable equal employment opportunity or other similar laws.  No matter where you’re based, you’ll experience a company that believes that teamwork and collaboration drive maximum impact, seeks well-rounded talent to focused on providing the best customer experience, and understands that this is a marathon, not a sprint. And, top of mind to us is continuously and purposefully building an inclusive culture that empowers all of our team members, across the globe, to do their best work and be the best version of themselves.
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Information Technology and Services, and Telecommunications

description: Every day, Global Payments makes it possible for millions of people to move money between buyers and sellers using our payments solutions for credit, debit, prepaid and merchant services. Our worldwide team helps over 3 million companies, more than 1,300 financial institutions and over 600 million cardholders grow with confidence and achieve amazing results. We are driven by our passion for success and we are proud to deliver best-in-class payment technology and software solutions. Join our dynamic team and make your mark on the payments technology landscape of tomorrow.  JD Pending  Global Payments Inc. is an equal opportunity employer.  Global Payments provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), national origin, ancestry, age, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, veteran status, genetic information or any other basis protected by law. description: 职位目的： 识别，确认和获取相关产品的销售机会。结合当前不断发展的客户需求，创建和管理销售和市场计划 利用标准程序和流程建立和执行销售计划和技术支持。维护并增进已有的客户关系 Purpose of Job： Identify, qualify and close sales opportunities in related products. Create and manage sales and marketing initiatives, incorporating current and evolving customer requirements. Utilize standard procedures and processes to establish and execute both sales plan and technical support. Maintain and improve customer relationship 工作职责： 根据公司要求以及相关市场策略及时完成各自的销售指标、有效利用自己的能力以及公司资源独立开发新市场、新客户； 维护并增进已有的客户关系； 与指定区域的经销商紧密合作，管理和监督经销商的业务结果和业务能力 向客户（终端用户）推广公司的产品及提供服务。 与服务团队紧密协作，协助维修工程师和应用支持专员安装仪器、技术支持，确保客户满意度 开展客户技术交流，收集市场和行业信息 完成上级领导交代的其他项目。 Key Responsibilities Achieve Sales target assigned by company, develop new customer and market for responsible products, maintain and improve customer relationships Work closely with distributors, manage and monitor distributor’s sales performance and capabilities Promote company products and services to the customers (end users) Work closely with service team, coordinate instrument installation and application solutions with service engineer and application specialist to ensure customer satisfaction Carry out technical communication with customers, collect market and industry information Complete other tasks assigned by line manager 任职条件： 医学检验或者生物医药相关专业背景本科以上 3年以上医疗行业一线销售工作经验，熟悉分子/免疫/小化学发光类产品者优先 良好的沟通能力，积极主动，以及团队精神 Bachelor’s degree of clinical diagnostics or Bio-pharmaceutical related At least 3 years sales experience in medical industry Good communication, Be proactive and team sprit

Manage business development efficiency related to deals in the account. Shape and close deals, working collaboratively with the Client Service Lead and LOBs’ Lead. Sales team management experience with solid sales performance. description: Description  What You Will Do In Your Role To be expert of assigned OEM account and expert of TSBU, knowing well TSBU technologies, products, organizations, process, etc…), represent TSBU in front of customer. Acting as communication channel between TSBU and sales force. Also leader and coordinator for platform design-in opportunities. Conduct Product trainings/introductions to customers/sales team/distribution team. Build relationship with OEM core team, especially connector related. Filter out real opportunities and work with Sales team to create CRM opportunities and support the New CRM opportunities to be Won. Collect information or conduct survey at specified OEM for Connector Technical Requirements/Specifications/Design Trends and Market trends information. Analyze relative information, develop and initiate new development opportunities. Create strategy in terms of TSBU revenue and profit growth, lead team to execute to achieve the goal. Ensure Molex advanced technology and products being introduced and accepted by OEM to generate more opportunities, taking necessary actions to secure a Molex existing business. Performs other related duties as assigned by management. The Experience You Will Bring  Requirements EDUCATION: Bachelor degree in Business or Technical area of study. WORK EXPERIENCE: 6-10 years experience as a Product Manager, Product marketing specialist, Sales Manager, Sales engineer, Product Engineering Manager, Product engineer or Project Manager at connector company for automotive industry or Automotive tier 1 including device maker and harness maker. SKILLS & ABILITIES: Familiar with automotive connector industry (basic knowledge, industry standard, OEM requirement). Strong business/market sense and negotiation skills to achieve business goal/solve problem for win-win scenario. Strong analytic and executive ability with clear strategic direction, able to lead team to create plan and implement with positive result English. Communication skill by which can express the opinions and facts accurately to Internally/Externally. Know well about OEM. OTHER: Be willing to travel to customers and other Molex locations frequently as needed. What Will Put You Ahead EDUCATION: Master Degree. WORK EXPERIENCE: Automotive Industry Experience Connector Industry Experience. SKILLS & ABILITIES: SAP. Commercial experience with Cost Analysis and Quote Development.
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Automotive, and Mechanical or Industrial Engineering

description: At Bayer we’re visionaries, driven to solve the world’s toughest challenges and striving for a world where ,Health for all, Hunger for none’ is no longer a dream, but a real possibility. We’re doing it with energy, curiosity and sheer dedication, always learning from unique perspectives of those around us, expanding our thinking, growing our capabilities and redefining ‘impossible’. There are so many reasons to join us. If you’re hungry to build a varied and meaningful career in a community of brilliant and diverse minds to make a real difference, there’s only one choice.  区域经理  Your Tasks And Responsibilities Implements the district sales strategy, ensures the achievement of sales goals through conducting academic promotion and maintaining networks with customers; and identifies business opportunities and problem areas 执行地区策略，通过学术推广、维护客户关系来确保销售目标的完成以及具备洞察业务机会和问题所在的能力。 Establishes goals for Medical Representatives in alignment with prescribed product strategies and monitors the progress towards them 根据制定的产品策略，帮助医学代表明确个人目标并监督达成的进展情况。 Organizes the collection of relevant market access data and competitive product information 组织收集相关市场准入数据及竞品信息。 Recruits and develops qualified personnel in cooperation with HR 与人力资源部合作 , 招聘及发展合格的从业人员。 Meets reporting requirements on product tracking, forecasting and effectively controls team costs 在产品追踪，预测及有效控制团队费用方面，能汇总报告。 Manages complaints and process through effective problem solving, execution, administration and resource management 通过有效的解决问题，执行，管理及资源管理来处理投诉。 Conducts performance management and development dialogues with subordinates; improves employees’ performance and engagement by coaching; executes performance improvement plans when necessary 通过与下属进行绩效管理及发展对话，来提高员工的绩效表现，在辅导中凝聚他们，必要时进行绩效改进计划。 Ensures compliance of all activities carried out in his/her team and provides regular compliance updates and trainings to subordinates 确保团队中所有的活动都能合规地进行，定期给下属提供合规政策更新和培训。 Who You Are University degree, preferably in the field of clinical medicine or pharmacy or equivalent qualification 大学学历，医药相关专业优先 At least two years of sales management experience within the medical industry, preferably in a MNC as well as leadership experience 至少 2 年在医药行业的管理经验，跨国企业管理经验优先 Team performance management and leadership skills, communication & authorization skills 团队管理及领导技巧 , 沟通与授权技巧 Profound knowledge of the Pharma market and related products 丰富的产品知识及市场营销知识 Excellent communication & negotiation skill 成熟的沟通和人际关系技巧以及良好的谈判技巧 Good command of both oral and written English 良好的英文口头表达及书写能力 Willingness to accept challenges and ability to work under pressure 愿意接受挑战和能在压力下工作 YOUR APPLICATION  If your background and personal experience fit this profile, please send us your complete application at www.career.bayer.cn If you have any recommendations, please kindly send mail to cnreferral@bayer.com  L ocation:  China : Shaan Xi : XiAn  Division:  Pharmaceuticals  Reference Code:  491842

Some experience in the field.
