✨ ABOUT LAUNCHMETRICS  Launchmetrics is the leading Brand Performance Cloud used by Fashion, Luxury and Beauty (FLB) executives to connect with the modern consumer in a constantly changing landscape. With over a decade of industry expertise, we have helped more than 1,000 customers create inspiring, impactful and measurable experiences.  Our Brand Performance Cloud provides companies with the tools and intelligence they need to optimize the use of their creative assets, execute powerful brand amplification programs and measure their brand performance. The company’s AI-driven and proprietary Media Impact Value gives customers the ability to benchmark their performance against 2,000 competitors worldwide. Launchmetrics' intelligence empowers these companies to grow their businesses and streamline their processes, bringing a sharp focus to profitability, accountability, and efficiency while enabling the type of quick decision making required for agility.  Founded in NYC and with operating headquarters in Paris, we have employees in eight markets worldwide and offer support in five languages. We have  been the trusted brand performance technology to brands worldwide such as Dior, Fendi, Shiseido, NET-A-PORTER and Adidas as well as partners like IMG, the Council of Fashion Designers of America, the British Fashion Council, and Camera Nazionale Della Moda Italiana.     💡 ABOUT THE SALES TEAM  We’re a small but mighty team of Sales Leaders and Executives, Account Managers, and Business Development representatives, distributed across 10 different countries worldwide.   We work diligently to build relationships with our global prospects and customers to help them identify their challenges and needs and articulate how these can be addressed through our Brand Performance Cloud.   Our mission is to showcase the great value and power our suite of products, services, and insights can bring to the marketing departments behind the world's biggest and best Fashion, Luxury, and Beauty brands.      🎯 ABOUT THE ROLE  The Regional Account Executive will be responsible for achieving new business targets and helping close new deals. As the Regional Account Executive, you will oversee the prospect’s engagement from prospecting, demo, to closing. You will also collaborate closely with Customer Success to ensure successful onboarding and positive customer engagement to ensure adoption.    Missions:   Develop your own sales pipeline. Hunter approach to initiating conversations with prospects such as C-level executives, Head of Public Relations, Communications or Marketing Departments.  Manage a portfolio of accounts. Success will mean satisfied, engaged customers that understand the value of our product offerings, high customer retention levels, and significant revenue expansion.  Be commercially aligned and focused to meet monthly new business targets.  Using customer data to present value of the service using clear numerical and verbal reasoning  Establish ongoing interaction with key stakeholders and decision-makers within the customer base to align current and future solutions to their strategic or tactical objectives.  Develop new and existing C-level relationships within a portfolio of accounts.  Create customer advocates and references for our offering.  Have new business growth in both MRR and services along with Improved renewal rates within assigned accounts.     🏆 ABOUT YOU  Your Profile   You can speak, read, and write English fluently. A big plus if you speak any of these 3 Asian languages Mandarin, Japanese or Korean  You have high energy, self-awareness, and commitment  You are a challenger seller with strong influencing skills  You have ability to work effectively as an individual as well as part of a global team  You are able to present confidently to an audience from all levels within a global organization  You can track record in reaching and exceeding goals in any fields  You can demonstrate an ability to cope with a complex and changing environment while projecting a positive sales attitude   You have strong strategic selling skills and business acumen & pipeline management skills  You have prior sales experience with software demonstrations is a bonus   You are bachelor degree or above.  You’ll be our rockstar if   You have knowledge about the Fashion, Luxury and Beauty industry  You have passion with social media, digital landscape, or software technology  You have experience using Salesforce    💥 WHAT DO WE HAVE TO OFFER?   A fantastic opportunity to participate in the development of a disruptive international company in an incredible work environment – cool, casual, fast-paced with a passionate, driven and fun team. Our people thrive under autonomy and can easily have a strong impact on our business, customers and organization. By joining us, you will have a chance to work in a cutting edge yet established global organization with more than a decade of sustainable growth and leading investors as partners.   At Launchmetrics, we care about each other and pay extra attention to things like:   Work-life Balance   Flexible Working  Team Building   Growth & Development  Health & Wellness   Diversity & Inclusion      🤝 WHAT CAN YOU EXPECT FROM OUR RECRUITMENT PROCESS?   Step 1: Intro Call   Step 2: Meet & Greet   Step 3: Skills Assessment   Step 4: Culture Fit Interview   Step 5: Leadership Interview

description: Job Title： Hitachi Vantara – Inside Sales Representative (内部/电话销售) Location: Beijing (北京)  What You'll Do 工作范围： You will build direct relationships with customers while working with channel partners to maximize new sales opportunities and renewals within your territory. 您将通过电话和客户及渠道合作伙伴直接建立联系，在您负责的领域内最大限度的开发新销售机会和拓展现有用户新需求。 You will manage all aspects of the full sales cycle to help customers reach their business goals. 您将负责并管理Hitachi Vantara解决方案的销售全流程，帮助客户实现其商业目标。 • You will position and sell the entire Digital Infrastructure portfolio. 您将通过电话的方式销售公司Digital Infrastructure（数字化基础架构）解决方案。 • You will seek to understand our customers’ business challenges and advise on the value derived from our solutions to address their pains. 您将通过电话的方式了解我们客户面临的业务挑战或者需求，并根据公司现有的解决方案给客户提供有价值的建议，帮助客户解决他们的业务挑战/困难。 • You will become a trusted advisor to help our customers with their immediate needs, as well as their long term goals. 成为客户信赖的顾问，满足他们目前的业务需求并帮助他们实现长期目标。 • You will accurately forecast your monthly, quarterly, and annual revenue streams; driving growth in your account base. 准确预测您的每月，季度和年度销售收益， 推动客户增加采购量。 • You will be responsible for driving new business, as well as fostering your account base. 开发更多的新客户，扩充您负责的区域内的客户资源。  Who You Are您是谁： • Goal-oriented and motivated by performance rewards 目标导向，以绩效奖励为动力 • Seek to achieve and exceed annual sales goals 努力实现并超过年度销售目标 • A strong collaborator with internal and external stakeholders 强有力的内部和外部合作者  Skills and Qualifications技能和任职资格： • 3+ years of B2B selling experience in a similar or adjacent industry 3 年以上B2B销售经验在IT行业或者相近行业优先考虑 • Experience owning the full sales cycle (prospecting, validating, negotiating, and closing the sale). 具备全流程销售经验背景 • Highly motivated with a “hunter spirit” to develop new opportunities and grow business 具有开拓者精神，积极开发新的商业机会并实现业务增长 • Demonstrate strong sales achievement (i.e., consistent achievement at or above quota, or a history YoY growth in your target market) 良好的销售业绩 • Passionate about sales and building positive relationships 拥有销售热情并积极拓展客户关系 • Possess strong business acumen and can articulate the value of a solution to address customers’ current and future needs 敏感的商业嗅觉， 清晰阐述Hitachi Vantara解决方案得价值，以解决客户当前或者未来得商业需求 • Engage in active listening to identify customers’ pain and help them derive the value and potential impact of a timely solution 积极倾听客户的痛点并及时给客户提供有价值的潜在解决方案 • Phenomenal communication/presentation skills 较强的沟通/表达能力 • Thrive in a team environment and enjoy sharing ideas and best practices 融入团队，愿意分享知识和最佳实践 • Experience using digital selling tools such as Salesforce and TechTarget 使用过Salesforce and TechTarget 系统优先考虑

The Customer Success Senior Manager plays a key role within the RippleNet Organization. The CSSM will focus on deepening customer relationships by scaling their volume with existing connections, connecting to additional qualified receivers, and upselling / cross-selling new products & services  What You’ll Do Develops a deep understanding of each customer's organization, internal communities, aspirations and needs whilst having knowledge of the technologies our customers use Identifies aspects of Ripple engagement and advocacy that needs to be strengthened. Considered an advisor/Ripple advocate among customers, enabling them to better exploit the potential of Ripple and participate in the development of new and ground-breaking concepts. Capable of financial, business and value analysis having the ability to understand and analyze key financial targets (cost reduction, revenue growth, etc.). Demonstrates a deep knowledge of customer success best practices in order to oversee and drive complex customer-facing delivery responsibilities for both business and technical workstreams. Executes day to day responsibilities with help and guidance from direct manager Navigates pre-sales activities challenges and promptly escalates when appropriate Identifies new business opportunities, develops account plans, QBRs and communicates these across the organization via SFDC and otherwise Leads hands-on tactical task management to drive shared key initiatives, works with cross-functional stakeholders (CPE, TS, Sales, BD, Finance, PMM, Legal) and manager to creatively solve complex business and operational issues, often unique to each customer. Collect feedback related to Ripple's value proposition Identifies challenges and provides insight and solutions in how to overcome them effectively working cross functionally to enhance volume over RippleNet Actively involved in improving internal processes cross functionally Capable of strategic, financial, business and value analysis. Develops a strategic perspective in order to create clarity out of complex and disconnected details. Has the ability to operate with little/no direct help from manager Identifies new business opportunities, develops prescriptive strategic plans and influences customer's stakeholders to transform the customer's business and drive platform adoption and volume. Creatively solves complex business and operational issues (internal/external) that may be inhibiting customer adoption and full utilization of Ripple Collates customer feedback into themes and develops solutions based on it Anticipates points of conflict and opportunity and articulates concrete and compelling terms on how they can be addressed What We're Looking For 10+ years of experience in transaction banking, cash management, FX, payment processing, or a related field at a major financial institution in a customer-facing field. - OR - Typically 8-10 years management consulting and delivery experience (or similar experience) gained within a technology or financial services organization.tent with product vision (i.e., SOA, Application integration, API design and management) Preferably prior experience working for a FinTech or start-up organisation Knowledgeable experience working with payment industry data standards (e.g. in Banking (ISO20022, domestic ACH schemes, SWIFT) Demonstrable understanding of multi-stakeholder management in complex environments Experience in development and launch of modern, complex business solutions involving innovative technology and B2B relationships Excellent in building and maintaining relationships in cross-functional teams Excellent Interpersonal skills and experience in coaching others. Ability to consult, motivate and inspire others to achieve challenging goals through leading by example You have interest and experience in championing and driving the development of product software feature You will have a sense of urgency and be highly self-motivated to create impact and succeed What We Offer The chance to work in a fast-paced start-up environment with experienced industry leaders A learning environment where you can dive deep into the latest technologies and make an impact Competitive salary and equity Medical and vision with 100% employer contributions for employees and dependents Industry-leading parental leave policies Generous wellness reimbursement program Weekly company-wide meeting - ask anything you may want to know Who We Are  Ripple is doing for value what the internet did for information: enabling its instant and seamless flow around the world. We call this the Internet of Value (IoV). Using blockchain and cryptocurrency technology, Ripple is dedicated to creating powerful gains in financial efficiency, equity and inclusion. In addition, Ripple is developing and enabling the future use cases that will catalyze the new digital economy for governments, businesses and consumers.  Ripple has offices in San Francisco (HQ), New York, London, Mumbai, Singapore, São Paulo, Reykjavík, Washington D.C. and Dubai.  Ripple is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive team. We do not discriminate against qualified employees or applicants because of race, color, religion, gender identity, sex, sexual preference, sexual identity, pregnancy, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, marital status, physical disability, mental disability, medical condition, military status, or any other characteristic protected by local law or ordinance.  Please find our UK/EU applicant privacy notice here.

description: (Senior)Technical Sales Representative  Key Responsibilities主要职责： 管理客户关系并提供相关服务，根据既定的市场开发原则在指定区域开拓新的客户，并保持从现有客户获得持续的销售业绩。 提供销售，活动及成本预算方面的信息，以利于销售经理做出有效的判断。 在既定的客户中，根据系统的调研和沟通，最大可能的发现影响客户现在及未来的商业机会及购买决定。 制定客户开发计划，并达到销售目标。 随时给医疗专家提供产品技术支持。 在负责的相关销售区域，了解当地的医疗市场及影响客户选择的竞争对手策略。 学习以保持对公司产品、临床应用、管理法规要求的质量标准和业务政策的及时理解。 Professional Knowledge, Skills & Qualifications任职要求： 2年及以上稳定的医药产品销售经验 (药品，耗材，设备均可） 本科及以上学历 (医学/药学/生物学等专业背景优先） 良好的沟通能力 良好的人际交往能力 良好的团队意识 良好的英文基础（CET-6，书写及口语） 可适应长短期出差

Cialfo is a leading platform connecting students, higher education institutions and counselors through technology driven solutions. Launched in 2017 with a mission to make education accessible to 100 million students, Cialfo provides a range of mobile and web solutions to students, K-12 institutions and higher education institutions. We’re one of the fastest-growing edtech startups in the region, consistently charting new heights!  With our fingers always on the pulse on the latest developments and technologies in education, the Growth team works to develop strong partnerships with K-12 schools and personalise solutions to support them. We’re an international team specialising in our own regions but united by our common goal of making education accessible to students worldwide. If you are passionate about making a positive impact in the education sector and are a driven self-starter with a knack for networking, join our K-12 partnerships team to be an advocate for Cialfo!  Job Description The Growth and Partnerships Manager at Cialfo drives the sales cycle in the assigned regional team - under the leadership of the Associate Director of Partnerships and in collaboration with other Growth and Partnerships Managers, Field Marketing, and Client Experience Managers. This role's key responsibility is to engage existing and new customers to develop and win regional opportunities for booking and realising revenue.  Responsibilities Sell consultatively to understand the customer's goals and challenges before offering solutions. Challenge the customer's perspective about their goals and challenges to offer a different perspective when required. Develop and win regional sales opportunities with their regional Growth Teams. Turning leads into opportunities to maintain a healthy pipeline. Discovering the goals of existing and potential customers. Develop a solution with our products that will address their challenges. Identifying champions for the solution they plan to propose. Proving the value of the Cialfo solution to every decision-maker or decision influencer. Negotiating commercial terms, contracts, and agreements to complete the sale. Focus on meeting your individual and team targets. Support leads as you progress them through our growth funnel. Manage email and school databases. Coordinate and attend conferences and events to represent Cialfo. Execute targeted & strategic outbound activity including cold calls and email follow-ups to reach key growth milestones.  Requirements 3+ years sales experience, preferable in IT/Services and Education industry. Proven track record of cold calling and prospecting to create new leads, achieving personal and team goals. Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Engineering, or related disciplines. Experience selling B2B preferred. Proven ability to build and drive strong relationships, becoming a trusted advisor. Strong communication and influencing skills. Solid understanding of enterprise SaaS applications and collaboration technology preferred. Interested in joining a fast-growing education technology startup. Highly organised and goals-driven. Coachable and value feedback. Proficiency with Excel and Salesforce is highly preferred. Comfortable in working with KPIs. Proficiency in Business Mandarin required to liaise with clients based in China.  Benefits  Exact benefits vary depending on your location. That said, all full-time Cialfo employees receive the following benefits: Paid Annual and Medical leaves Flexible working environment Medical Health Insurance and more...

jobTitle: Travel Retail - Retail Education Senior Executive, Shiseido

This position is based in Shanghai, China. As a key member of the Travel Retail team, you will be responsible to execute and support the Brand’s education strategy, to deliver PRC consumer-centric retail training for our beauty consultants, promoters, and generic staff (GS) for China retailers.  Responsibilities  Training Responsibilities: Develop and execute retail training plans in accordance with marketing launches and sales strategies In collaboration with the Retail Education Manager, support the customization, translation and preparation of training materials to suit TR environment. Conduct initial & seasonal training for Beauty Consultants, promoters and generic staff Organize, design and facilitate in annual BA seminar Work with Education Manager to evaluate and analyse service, retail related reports and development of action plans Together with the Retail Education Manager, develop and lead the execution of specialized training programs and activities that elevate product knowledge and build Beauty Consultants capabilities that drive Retail Excellence Follow up with in-store/counter coaching to ensure consistency of service delivery, grooming and achievement of sales goals Provide input to Retail team regarding reward and incentive plans for Beauty Consultants to support motivational / recognition programs Provide feedback to different functions to ensure effective training follow-up after-market visits Manage all logistics around training sessions directly with the operators Work closely with Education Manager to ensure all training and travel expenses are within budgets Event Responsibilities Collaborate with Sales and Marketing in planning, executing and fronting consumer workshops and events, as well as managing social media/press events Manage and run on counter events with Beauty Consultants to impart beauty tips and techniques to consumers Train and prepare Beauty Consultants and promoters to support events/workshops to achieve sales targets Requirements Bachelor's Degree in any related discipline Minimum 3 years of relevant working experience and preferably coming from/or a similar industry Independent team player with a passion for education Good skincare and makeup techniques Strong presentation skills Strong command of spoken and written in English and Mandarin (Putonghua) is required, for classroom/event presentations and translations into Simplified Chinese Strong communication skills, highly organized, meticulous and attentive to details Proficient in Microsoft Office especially PowerPoint Ability to organize and manage independent travelling to Greater China Frequent travelling is required (at least 50%)

Ideal candidate will work closely with internal marketing and sales members, as well as channel partners to research potential accounts, identify key players and source new sales opportunities before passing to sales team for development.  Essential Duties And Responsibilities Actively conduct demand generation activities such as outbound calls, personalized emails, networking, social media engagement to reach out to potential prospects, understand needs and generate interest to achieve quarterly targets Research accounts and identify key players in targeted industry or sub-segment based on sales requirement and market opportunities Partner with other functions (marketing, applications, customer support) to run outbound campaign to new prospects and installed base initiatives Match Stratasys solution and application to satisfy customer needs and pain points Maintain database and manage pipeline movement from lead creation, qualification to solution selection Route qualified opportunities to respective account manager or channel partner for further development and closure Respond in a timely manner to inbound inquiry from incoming phone, email, and website etc. by marketing, promotions and sales executives Act as primary point of contact for requests for information, quotes and general follow-up activities with the designated customer base Any other ad-hoc projects & tasks as per guided by management Education, Skills And Experience Minimum 3 years of enterprise/B2B inside sales or direct sales experience in the technology/high-tech/ hardware industry for cross-Asia region Native mandarin speaker (verbal and written) with excellent business English proficiency Self-motivated, result-driven and strong desire to succeed with a “can-do” spirit Outgoing personality with high listening skill working directly with customers in a consultative approach Associate degree in business administration, statistics or related field; university matriculated a plus Computer literate, proficient in MS office. Experienced with Salesforce.com, Analytic tools an advantage Possess conflict resolution skills and escalation management Ability to work under pressure to meet tight deadlines and adapt to changes in a fast-paced environment

description: Job Description  This role is a CBA position who will manage Discrete Graphics business. This role will responsible for demand/supply management, revenue forecasts, rebate accruals and processes rebates for DGx product lines. He/She will be working closely with customer on demand collaboration and apply judgment based on roadmap and pricing strategy in order to provide accurate demand signal to factory. In addition, he/she will manage daily order fulfilment, revenue forecast management by considering all the key factors such as supply, customer raw demand, consumption, inventory, pricing strategy to provide accurate revenue forecast to BU Ops and field sales. For quarter end closing activities, he/she is required to support accrual booking, carry out quarterly SOX control on all relevant contracts to ensure 100% compliance and meet audit requirements.  Qualifications Bachelor degree preferred. Business, Economics or Supply Chain concentrations preferred. 2+ years related experience Excellent communication and collaboration skills Advanced working knowledge of Excel Ability to synthesize complex data into a clear actionable conclusions A 'can-do' approach and attitude, willingness to take informed risks in order to achieve desired organization and Intel goals Ability to quickly digest problems and drive solutions across a dynamic stakeholder base Innovative and self-directed Flexible and ability to embrace change in a fast paced environment Inside this Business Group  Intel's Sales and Marketing (SMG) organization works with global customers and partners to solve critical business problems with Intel based technology solutions. SMG works across business units to amplify the customer voice and deliver solutions that accelerate their business. We work across numerous industries, including retail, enterprise and government, cloud services and healthcare as examples. The operations team focuses on forecasting, driving alignment with factory production and delivering efficiency tools and our marketing capability drives demand and localized marketing in locations around the globe. Our sales force navigates a complex partner and customer ecosystem while shaping product roadmaps, driving value for our customers, and collaborating to harness emerging technology trends to deliver comprehensive solutions.
industries: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing, Information Technology and Services, and Computer Software

description: UMajor Responsibilities/Activities  Execute sales actions plans, deliver sales objectives, grow Abbott’s sales at pharmacy, focusing on the priority products and developing a sustainable pharmacist’s preference for Abbott taking into account the commercial strategy (Segmentation and Targeting, Value Proposition to Customers) Have a solid knowledge and understanding of the customers in the territory: sales, sales potentials, organization, purchasing criteria…, deliver Field intelligence to Marketing, and Brand Teams Develop a strong network in the territory, ensuring that all key influencers are frequently visited with management (e.g.: Pharmacists belonging to Trade associations, influent pharmacists in Chains…). Develop a routing system that optimizes coverage and frequency to consistently achieve call metrics Develop a thorough business plan for the most strategic pharmacies Set SMART objectives for each visit, regarding sell-in and sell-out actions. Use commercial policy and value proposition to determine strategy and tactics to maximize customers’ growth and commitments towards Abbott Execute store-checks, check stock levels and follow-up sell-out data at each visit. Understand accurately pharmacist’s needs and expectations, opportunities and threats for Abbott, competition’s practices Customize approach to customers when relevant (e.g.: for POS belonging to chains, taking into account the strategy defined by MKT and the actual level of compliance in the chain). Properly execute customer loyalty programs (if relevant) Demonstrate to Pharmacists the profit they will realize thanks to Abbott’s value proposition Ensure that Abbott’s brands are effectively available in store (right range, available stock), visible when applicable (space management and display, in store communication, promotion), and actively recommended (counter team skills development, motivation…) 8．requirements Industry experiences: At least 0.5-1 year sales experience in OTC or FMCG drugstore. Position experiences: 0.5-5 years of commercial/sales experience that involved working closely with customers to deliver results Language Skills： Computer Skills: Be good at MS office Mobility: Certificate Required: Other Special requirement: Strong presentation skills, Consultative selling skills, Negotiation skills

Job Description  JOB PURPOSE The position provides a substantial opportunity for career development, and the DP will lead and drive Asia demand planning activities for bandsaw part. This position supports the DP in providing visibility and guidance when skillful balance demands across different functional coordination. It is a critical, challenging and rewarding role, and drives company to achieve supply chain sustainable excellence. SS E&O reserve process (minimum Education And Experience Required And Key Personal Characteristics) 3-5+ years of experience in forecasting, 2+year supply planning or related experience. Results Driven : Ensures efforts are focused on the activities that positively impact business results. Exhibits a “performance mentality” by displaying the appropriate sense of urgency in accomplishing goals and takes corrective actions to ensure that critical projects achieve results. Collaboration : Working effectively and cooperatively with others; establishing and maintaining good working relationships. Facilitator in assisting company to achieve goals. Communication : Understands people’s differences in communication and is able to articulate messages at all levels, directive approach to message. Listens to other people’s point of view and incorporate into message Customer Focus : Making customers and their needs a primary focus. Job Title： Hitachi Vantara – Inside Sales Representative (内部/电话销售) Location: Beijing (北京)  What You'll Do 工作范围： You will build direct relationships with customers while working with channel partners to maximize new sales opportunities and renewals within your territory. 您将通过电话和客户及渠道合作伙伴直接建立联系，在您负责的领域内最大限度的开发新销售机会和拓展现有用户新需求。 You will manage all aspects of the full sales cycle to help customers reach their business goals. 您将负责并管理Hitachi Vantara解决方案的销售全流程，帮助客户实现其商业目标。 • You will position and sell the entire Digital Infrastructure portfolio. 您将通过电话的方式销售公司Digital Infrastructure（数字化基础架构）解决方案。 • You will seek to understand our customers’ business challenges and advise on the value derived from our solutions to address their pains. 您将通过电话的方式了解我们客户面临的业务挑战或者需求，并根据公司现有的解决方案给客户提供有价值的建议，帮助客户解决他们的业务挑战/困难。 • You will become a trusted advisor to help our customers with their immediate needs, as well as their long term goals. 成为客户信赖的顾问，满足他们目前的业务需求并帮助他们实现长期目标。 • You will accurately forecast your monthly, quarterly, and annual revenue streams; driving growth in your account base. 准确预测您的每月，季度和年度销售收益， 推动客户增加采购量。 • You will be responsible for driving new business, as well as fostering your account base. 开发更多的新客户，扩充您负责的区域内的客户资源。  Who You Are您是谁： • Goal-oriented and motivated by performance rewards 目标导向，以绩效奖励为动力 • Seek to achieve and exceed annual sales goals 努力实现并超过年度销售目标 • A strong collaborator with internal and external stakeholders 强有力的内部和外部合作者  Skills and Qualifications技能和任职资格： • 3+ years of B2B selling experience in a similar or adjacent industry 3 年以上B2B销售经验在IT行业或者相近行业优先考虑 • Experience owning the full sales cycle (prospecting, validating, negotiating, and closing the sale). 具备全流程销售经验背景 • Highly motivated with a “hunter spirit” to develop new opportunities and grow business 具有开拓者精神，积极开发新的商业机会并实现业务增长 • Demonstrate strong sales achievement (i.e., consistent achievement at or above quota, or a history YoY growth in your target market) 良好的销售业绩 • Passionate about sales and building positive relationships 拥有销售热情并积极拓展客户关系 • Possess strong business acumen and can articulate the value of a solution to address customers’ current and future needs 敏感的商业嗅觉， 清晰阐述Hitachi Vantara解决方案得价值，以解决客户当前或者未来得商业需求 • Engage in active listening to identify customers’ pain and help them derive the value and potential impact of a timely solution 积极倾听客户的痛点并及时给客户提供有价值的潜在解决方案 • Phenomenal communication/presentation skills 较强的沟通/表达能力 • Thrive in a team environment and enjoy sharing ideas and best practices 融入团队，愿意分享知识和最佳实践 • Experience using digital selling tools such as Salesforce and TechTarget 使用过Salesforce and TechTarget 系统优先考虑

description: Job Scope:- Responsible for T-mall flagship store management, the overall operation of the store, and the completion of store KPI. Overall planning of the T-mall store, annual activity rhythm control (platform rhythm, hot topics, hot festivals, etc.), conduct and launch the plans, formulating event operation systems and standards. Responsible for the marketing of products and stores, good at refining needs and promoting selling points, and cooperating with agency to complete the advertorial/copywriting and visual design of the store. Collect and analyse market and competitor data, study brand crowds, store crowds, category crowds, and study the consumption habits and purchasing behaviours of customers. Responsible for the resolution and communication of after service. Responsible for the private domain traffic operation of the store, incl. interactive operation of traffic channels such as fans, members, and Weitao, etc. Inventory management and related store back-end operations. Support the development of new products and daily routine works of branded goods.  Qualifications:- University education background, major in commerical or business preferred. Great passion to automotive industrial; More than 2 years of experience in T-mall/Taobao brand store operation. Good understanding of e-commerce operations, have data analysis capabilities, and have some experience in obtaining internal and external traffic. Have a clear activity planning ability, understand the rules of platform activity, and be able to plan and execute clearly. Have product planning and data analysis capabilities, and be able to use core product data in the store to propose strategic ideas to improve store conversion rate. Proficient in the supervision of e-commerce platforms, proficient in the platform promotion tools and activities, and independently lead the T-Mall project, incl. design and implementation. It is better to have experience on handling large-scale events such as Double 11. Good at advertorial/copywriting, able to independently write activity plans and communication copywriting. Have marketing/sales planning experience in e-commerce, new media, social groups and other channels; familiar with live broadcast process in Kuaishou/ Douyin/ Taobao/T-Mall. Proficient in using excel & powerpoint. Fluent English both oral and written.

Are You Ready to Join Our Team? We are busy, growing quickly and have an incredible workforce who are committed to becoming the #1 Software company in the world. Come join HCL’s fast-growing, $1.8B+ software business and make an impact from Day 1! This is an exciting time to be joining HCL Software, as we expand, invest and grow. HCL Software is building a newly team of Digital Product Sales Specialist who will report to a Digital Product Specialist leader. This role is to oversee a portfolio of assigned customers, expand and develop new business and actively seek new sales opportunities. HCL Software is the Software Business Unit of HCL Technologies. We have 20+ products in our Software Suite including - BigFix, Workload Automation, AppScan, DevOps, Domino, Notes, Connections, Same Time, Unica, Verse, Digital Experience, Commerce, Mainframe Solutions. People with Pre-Sales, Software consulting, IT Delivery role who are interesting in Sales are also welcome for this role.  We are building a Digital Sales Hub and we are looking for DevOps Product Sales Specialists. The Digital Product Sales Specialists DevOps are responsible for driving Enterprise Software Sales for the above-mentioned products in their territory. The individual will be responsible for the following:  • Deep understanding of any one of the HCL Software products or their competition. • Drive software license sales in their territory to achieve/exceed their sales targets. • Highly motivated with a “hunter spirit” to develop new opportunities and grow business. • Identify gaps in the client DevOps practice, process, and skills with the intent to address, educate, and bring their teams together to drive consensus through transparency and collaboration. • Articulate AHEAD’s framework and engagement approach around our DevOps offerings from a technical and business perspective • Understanding and experience with various cloud platforms such as Google and AWS. • Experience working with DevOps technology. • Ability to solve customer specific business problems and apply DevOps solutions. • Route qualified large deal opportunities to relevant Field Product Specialists or partners to pursue further. • Experience in “owning” a portfolio of accounts. • Sales Planning, Budgeting, Forecasting for their territory or cluster. • Ensure attainment of revenue and associated targets. • Will cold-call prospects that are generated by external sources of lead. • Demonstrable ability to communicate, present and influence key stakeholders at all levels of an organization. • Ability to learn and adapt quickly in a fast-paced, dynamic, team-oriented environment. • Proven ability to juggle and sell multiple products at a time, while maintaining sharp attention to detail. • Develop sales opportunities by researching and identifying potential accounts. • Set up and deliver sales presentations, product/service demonstrations, and other sales actions. • Provide updates and reporting on forecasting and other sales activities such as pipeline development and active deals as part regular sales cadence. • Emphasize product features and benefits, quote prices, discuss credit terms, and prepare sales order forms and/or reports.  Key Responsibilities • Demonstrated ability to convert prospects and close deals and achieve Sales Quotas. • opportunity qualification, pre-call planning, call control, account development, and time management • Success in qualifying opportunities involving multiple key decision makers. • Strong knowledge of sales principles, methods, practices, and techniques • Strong problem identification and objections resolution skills • Able to build and maintain lasting relationships with customers. • Capture customer information, identify key players, including addresses and phone numbers, for future follow-up. • Source new sales opportunities through inbound lead follow-up and outbound cold calls and emails • Route qualified opportunities to the appropriate sales Specialists for further development and closure. Team with channel partners to build pipeline and close deals. • Close sales and achieve quarterly quotas. • Deal Approvals & Delegation • Microsoft Dynamics CRM - Lead Management & Opportunity Management • Ensure sales, finance and legal policies and procedures are met as per HCL Software Legal Terms & Conditions  Candidate Specific Skills • Experience in Sales Management, Lead Generation; Offering Campaign Management • Experience and track record of carrying a sales quota for Bookings and Pipeline Creation in Digital Segment • Opportunity Identification & qualification; Business Development; Client Centric Marketing • In-depth understanding of the sales process • Strong analytical and organizational skills. Able to perform basic calculations and mathematical figures. • Self-motivated, with high energy and an engaging level of enthusiasm • Ability to meet travel requirements, when applicable • Ability to work individually and as part of a team. • Language Proficiency - Excellent in Malay, Cantonese, Mandarin  Job Specific Skills • Familiarity with HCL Software products • CRM skills, preferably with MS Dynamics and excel • Sales cadence and deal review experience • Excellent communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills in English   https://www.hcltech.com/candidate-privacy-notice

description: About Us  Gore is a materials science company focused on improving lives through discovery, product innovation and rewarding careers for our Associates.  About The Industry  Saving lives and improving the quality of life for patients is at the core of everything we do. This meaningful work gives purpose to our lives and inspires us to create solutions that make a difference in the lives of others. Learn more at gore.com/products/industries  About The Role  We are looking for a Field Sales Associate to join our Medical Product Division Sale Team in Hangzhou, Zhejiang who will be accountable for meeting or exceeding the sales forecast in Zhejiang, Fujian provinces.  Responsibilities: Develop profitable sales opportunities, proactively make sales calls Develop new business to align with Gore business needs Ensure the KOL management, market data collection, etc., are effective, builds, maintains and defends long-term customer relationships Ensure the cooperation with other product specialists are active and constructive, to achieve team goals and objectives Implement value pricing principle, be a value seller, skilled in the use of premise-based forecasting techniques Implement Gore’s product strategy, understands the needs of the customer  Required Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in medical or medicine Proven sales background, preferably with a minimum of 5 years in the medical devices sales area Will have worked in or able to demonstrate an understanding of the imperatives of a business environment Clinical background in interventional areas or sales experience to this environment Strong communication and interpersonal skills A high level of self-motivation and passion, ensuring the ability to work under minimal supervision Commercial acumen High integrity Capable and ability to travel extensively up to 60% and attend weekend conferences as required  What We Offer  At Gore, we want our Associates to have fulfilling careers driven by curiosity and commitment. In return, we commit to our Associates by offering comprehensive, competitive rewards in the form of compensation, benefits, an Associate stock ownership-type plan, and opportunities for growth and development. Learn more at gore.com/careers  We believe in the strength of a diverse workforce and inclusive work environment. In support of our values and continued success we are proud of Associates around the world who support an inclusive work environment, strive to reflect the diversity of the communities where we operate, and ensure all Associates and external partners are treated with fairness, dignity and respect.  Our Talent Acquisition Team welcomes your questions via email at AP_TA@wlgore.com  Job  Sales  Primary Location  Asia-Pacific-CN-SH-Jing'an  Travel%  60%  Shift  Day  Schedule  Full-time

At Bayer we’re visionaries, driven to solve the world’s toughest challenges and striving for a world where ,Health for all, Hunger for none’ is no longer a dream, but a real possibility. We’re doing it with energy, curiosity and sheer dedication, always learning from unique perspectives of those around us, expanding our thinking, growing our capabilities and redefining ‘impossible’. There are so many reasons to join us. If you’re hungry to build a varied and meaningful career in a community of brilliant and diverse minds to make a real difference, there’s only one choice.  区域经理  Your Tasks And Responsibilities Implements the district sales strategy, ensures the achievement of sales goals through conducting academic promotion and maintaining networks with customers; and identifies business opportunities and problem areas 执行地区策略，通过学术推广、维护客户关系来确保销售目标的完成以及具备洞察业务机会和问题所在的能力。 Establishes goals for Medical Representatives in alignment with prescribed product strategies and monitors the progress towards them 根据制定的产品策略，帮助医学代表明确个人目标并监督达成的进展情况。 Organizes the collection of relevant market access data and competitive product information 组织收集相关市场准入数据及竞品信息。 Recruits and develops qualified personnel in cooperation with HR 与人力资源部合作 , 招聘及发展合格的从业人员。 Meets reporting requirements on product tracking, forecasting and effectively controls team costs 在产品追踪，预测及有效控制团队费用方面，能汇总报告。 Manages complaints and process through effective problem solving, execution, administration and resource management 通过有效的解决问题，执行，管理及资源管理来处理投诉。 Conducts performance management and development dialogues with subordinates; improves employees’ performance and engagement by coaching; executes performance improvement plans when necessary 通过与下属进行绩效管理及发展对话，来提高员工的绩效表现，在辅导中凝聚他们，必要时进行绩效改进计划。 Ensures compliance of all activities carried out in his/her team and provides regular compliance updates and trainings to subordinates 确保团队中所有的活动都能合规地进行，定期给下属提供合规政策更新和培训。 Who You Are University degree, preferably in the field of clinical medicine or pharmacy or equivalent qualification 大学学历，医药相关专业优先 At least two years of sales management experience within the medical industry, preferably in a MNC as well as leadership experience 至少 2 年在医药行业的管理经验，跨国企业管理经验优先 Team performance management and leadership skills, communication & authorization skills 团队管理及领导技巧 , 沟通与授权技巧 Profound knowledge of the Pharma market and related products 丰富的产品知识及市场营销知识 Excellent communication & negotiation skill 成熟的沟通和人际关系技巧以及良好的谈判技巧 Good command of both oral and written English 良好的英文口头表达及书写能力 Willingness to accept challenges and ability to work under pressure 愿意接受挑战和能在压力下工作 YOUR APPLICATION  If your background and personal experience fit this profile, please send us your complete application at www.career.bayer.cn If you have any recommendations, please kindly send mail to cnreferral@bayer.com  L ocation:  China : Si Chuan : ChengDu  Division:  Pharmaceuticals  Reference Code:  490661

工作目标  向PLS/MOE学校提出解决方案，以支持学习者提高学习效率； 在指定区域内推动销售增长，达到月度/年度财务目标； 收集和分析客户的需求痛点来促进业务创新  主要职责 1 华南区核心城市的业务维护及开发（深圳市） a) 深圳市国际学校及大中型教培机构客户的维护与开发 b) 配合Spark独家代理商进行全国性渠道的开发与整合工作 c) 制定销售计划，包括潜在客户的生成、跟踪和推进。 d) 及时了解和评估竞争对手和竞品，确保培生在市场上保持竞争优势。 e) 对指定区域的销售渠道进行管理与维护，确保经销商向学校提供高质量的服务 f) 主动开发终端用户，并维护集中数据库  2. 华南区域内新客户、新业务模式的开发 a) 广东省内（东莞、佛山、惠州、珠海等）科技公司的合作 b) 新的业务模式的开展，如电子授权、OMO、定制出版等 c) 新的客户群体开发与合作（少年宫、图书馆）  3. 华南区域核心省份的业务开发（福建省） a) 分析该区域市场机会，识别关键目标客户，特别是对巨大潜力的客户，建立联系数据库。与潜在客户建立初步沟通或跟进有效人员(经理，销售代表等) 提供的线索，促进项目发展。 b) 传统学校/机构客户的开发（侧重语言类素质教育培训） c) 新业务类型、新合作方式（与教育科技类公司合作，发展新的项目及业务模式）  4. 业务单位的职责 a) 按要求向部门经理提交月度报告。 b) 确保部门经理及时了解业务问题。 c) 与业界紧密合作，建立互信，以创新解决方案，满足学校未满足的需求  工作要求  a) 至少5年以上B2B行业销售计划和执行经验，有教育行业和跨国公司经验者优先 b) 具备商务专业水平的中英文沟通能力; 具备专业的英文邮件写作能力，口语流利者优先 c) 有条理、系统的思考者和执行者 d) 能够在没有监督的情况下工作 e) 学校能力强并好学 f) 支持团队工作 g) 愿意经常出差  亮点  a) 有教育部门工作经验，尤其是学校工作经验者优先。 b) 有中小学(K-12) 工作经验者优先。 c) 有跨国公司工作经验者优先。 d) 有海外留学/工作经验者优先。

Background and Executive Summary Our Business is growing exponentially in China and in order to provide better service to the local customers, distributors, and end-users, we are looking for an experienced Inside Sales Service Specialist to join our team, Location is in Guangzhou, China. The new team member will alleviate the workload of the Richmond team and strengthen physical communications within China. The role will take care of the operation and process after the orders are finalized with the customers. She/He will have access to the company’s SAP system and cooperate with customer accounts or other relevant departments within the mills. This person will also handle the receiving and dispatching of all samples.  Job description - Knowledge of SAP and entering orders into SAP system - Follow-up with customers; proactively inform customers of the status of their orders and provide the proper details to answer questions. - Pursue production, logistic, and delivery details and troubleshoot any issues regarding orders. - Close communication with customers and sales - Daily sales operation and supporting - Able to work collaboratively with various departments to resolve customer issues - Collaboration and regular meetings with the key players at the mill - Samples management and record keeping.  Qualifications: - 5-8 years experience or Import/Export knowledge preferred - Knowledge of paper and packaging industry preferred but not mandatory - Excellent Word, Excel, PowerPoint, must have SAP system skills - Excellent written and spoken English - Cross-functional collaboration and teamwork project management skills - Good problem solving with a strong analytical sense - Customer and results-oriented, can work under pressure - Quick and careful learner, can work efficiently and effectively - Self-disciplined and self-motivated; Independent

Are you looking to build a long-term sales career with a leader in forwarding and logistics? Join our international seafreight/airfreight team at cargo-partner, be a part of our ongoing success story. To support our rapid growth in Asia Pacific, we are hiring highly motivated individuals who are sales savvy, and believe in delivering quality service to fulfil customer needs.  If you are excited about meeting sales challenges, and has a proven track record of opening doors and closing sales, let’s talk!  Descriptions Of Key Responsibilities/ Tasks  Business Development- To coordinate, direct and lead sales within defined field of responsibility. To own business development activities. To be responsible for route management and development of defined markets and trade lanes. To manage, develop and oversee global agents relationship for defined markets and trade lanes. To retain & keep good relationship with existing clients. To represent interests of the Company before third parties. To coordinate the relations with other sections in the Company. To follow and accomplish Business Development department common targets. To persuade a profit policy at all the time. Route Development- To perform partner development for the well-defined geographical area; display of partner network; inform and update them about our products; build up a versatile network, monitor profitability of the partner and area. To attract target partners for the entire cargo-partner network. To expertise in country facts and knowledge, economic geography skills, competitor information, key and target accounts. To perform sales lead management. To expert sales pressure to the partner and also with the cargo-partner group to sell the sales areas vice versa. To monitor risk management and payment term agreements. To publish the system partners in all areas and sections of the Company. To assist superior route management and development of defined markets and trade lanes. Minimum Education /Qualifications/Experience: University degree in Business Administration/ Logistics or equivalent . Approximately 3 years’ business development/ sales experience. Fluency in both English & Mandarin.  Company Introduction  cargo-partner is a privately owned full-range info-logistics provider offering a comprehensive portfolio of air, sea, land transport and warehousing services, with special expertise in information technology and supply chain optimization. The company operates over 130 offices in 40 countries around the world to create fast and efficient solutions for a wide range of industries. With the SPOT platform, cargo-partner ensures easy cooperation and full transparency throughout the supply chain.  As a family-owned business, we are very employee-oriented and want to work with you to develop your career and personal goals. Take a look at our Mission & Vision.  If you are looking for a challenging position in an innovative and dynamic international company, we want to get to know you!  Privacy Policy  Apply now! It will only take a minute, we promise!

Be the point person for dedicated illumina User Group Meetings in collaboration with field marketing and support team to provide sample to data workflow training Assists sales and field marketing on new strategic initiatives requiring both technical and market knowledge Works collaboratively with territory account managers, marketing, service and support teams to ensure effective account/customer management and communication through pre-sales, during and- post-sales cycle, including review and meeting account pull through targets and goals Escalates technical issues to Technical Support for possible resolution for strategically important labs. Develops and maintain positive relationships with customers in assigned territory Listed responsibilities are an essential, but not exhaustive list, of the usual duties associated with the position. Changes to individual responsibilities may occur due to business needs.  Preferred Requirements Life science industry experience preferred Applied Market Knowledge is a plus Extensive experience and understanding of leading genetics technologies and how they can be applied. Detailed knowledge of technological developments and trends in the sequencing markets Excellent communication (verbal and written) and presentation skills in Mandarin and English. Strong negotiation skills and ability to persuade Ability to travel within region to carry out primary responsibilities. All listed requirements are deemed as essential functions to this position; however, business conditions may require reasonable accommodations for additional task and responsibilities.  Preferred Experience/Education Typically requires a Bachelor’s degree and a minimum of 0-2 years of related experience; or equivalent work experience. 岗位概述  Responsibilities 售前活动将包括销售过程中的技术知识演讲，如介绍演讲、研讨会、个别咨询等，在必要时，进行演示实验。 对因美纳测序和微阵列平台的应用或工作流程进行技术层面和应用层面的介绍。 售后活动包括与安装产品后的客户的协调，提供在具有重要战略意义的实验室中所需的工作流程或应用培训 支持/辅助客户的相关测序阵列设计，加快在客户因美纳平台上目标测序进程。 参加相关领域的展览会/大会。 作为与现场营销和支持团队合作的专项人员参加因美纳用户组会议，提供样品数据工作流程培训。 提供销售或现场营销新战略项目时所需有关技术和市场知识。 与区域客户经理、营销、服务和支持团队合作工作，保证有效的大客户/客户管理以及负责售前、售中和售后过程的沟通，包括回访和会面已经取得成果或达成目标的客户。 作为技术支持提供技术升级，为具有重要战略意义的实验室提供可能的解决方案。 提升和维护责任区域内客户的良好关系。 以上所列的任务和职责是本岗位的基本功能。然而，各种商务条件下可能需要完成额外的任务和职责。  Preferred Requirements 有生命科学行业经验者优先 有应用市场知识者加分 具有领先的遗传学技术及其应用方面的丰富经验和充分理解 具有技术发展和测序市场趋势的详细知识 优秀的中文普通话和英文口头和书面交流和介绍演讲技能 良好的谈判技巧和说服能力 能在负责区域内出差并完成主要职责 Preferred Experience/Education 科学学科的硕士以上学历（分子生物学、遗传学、或基因组学和/或生物信息学优先）

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Who We Are  Airwallex is a technology company that revolutionises the way businesses operate globally. Our financial infrastructure provides a modern technology stack for businesses to operate internationally, without the challenges of the current global financial system.  Businesses use Airwallex as their end-to-end global financial services platform. Whether it’s making or receiving payments from customers, domestically or internationally, Airwallex saves businesses time and money by offering real-time, reliable and cost-effective financial solutions. Our web and API solutions support businesses of all sizes, from small companies to large enterprises.  In this fast-changing digital world that is increasingly becoming borderless, our mission is to empower businesses of all sizes to grow in their own markets and around the world, and by doing so, contribute to the global economy. Involve local office team for issue resolving and new project implementation.   Lead responses to RFQ/RFP of the global accounts and drive the implementation afterwards.   Establish long-term strategic partnership with clients, account management, bid management and contract negotiation;   Support other internal organizations to secure the business opportunities or sales leads;   Share valuable market information within the team and the network for management strategic decision making;   Develop extensive knowledge of the customers’ industry, their customers and their critical business issues, incl. finance, operation and the supply chain.   Regularly review with customers on achievement of performance outcomes including collation of customer agreed KPI’s, organize the regular meeting with operations and service team.   Contract renewal or any new RFQ tendered for incremental business from the accounts.  任职要求： Bachelor degree, major in Logistics/Sales Marketing related preferred. 3 years relevant working experience. Deep understanding of Contract Logistics strategy, products and solutions for price, cost and commercial preferred. Familiar with local business environment and international business development trends, good sense of the industry development trend and requirements; Familiar with international logistics operation environment preferred; Project management skill, ability to find and develop new business and to write up logistics solution proposal. Self-motivated, proactive working attitude, leading, optimistic personality and capable to work in team Good command of English (written & spoken), excellent presentation skill, excellent communication and interpersonal skills Good PC skills, eg. Word, Excel, PPT, etc.

companyName: 霍尼韦尔(中国)有限公司
description: 该职位来源于猎聘  Manage all aspects of engagements with existing and new customers for our UOP organization. You will build relationships and understand customer business in order to provide appropriate products or solutions. You will define sales and growth strategy toward key customers while aligning with critical sales business objectives. You will identify opportunities and build credibility with customers Utilize your product knowledge to deliver the value proposition to the customers  Key Responsibilities Develop strong and solid pipeline and update it in SFDC timely. Deliver agreed sales AOP and revenue. Develop account planning through the sales process. Organize and lead internal RFQ/proposal review and pricing/bid strategy meetings. Prepare and issue commercial offers. Draft, negotiate, and finalize appropriate agreements to close sales. Forecast sales with high accuracy - Project description, estimated contract value, timing, probabilities and actions. Prepare project specific sales strategies for each sales event. Gather competitive intelligence for submission to Product Line Managers and Marketing. Manage receivable collection efforts with finance staff. Work with customers to set expectations for UOP's service interaction by working closely with UOP's project managers. Complete win/loss reports for projects in a timely fashion. Assist SBU management with managing the interface with key clients. Assist in identifying and communicating cross-SBU project opportunities to the relevant SBU Assist Sales Leader in developing sales strategies to drive growth. YOU MUST HAVE Bachelor's degree (or above) in Chemical or Mechanical Engineering. At least 10 years Sales and/or technical experience with preference given to refinery & petrochemical, or a related industry, such as coal chemical or steel industry. Ideally the candidate will have significant sales related (Account Management) experience. PC literate. Able to communicate effectively in English, both spoken & written. WE VALUE Demonstrated communication and interpersonal skills. An ability to work independently and under the pressure. Strong analytical skills. Building Strong relationships. Strong desire to win. Highly motivated. Team player. Customer orientation. Technical or application mindset. Experience in a global organization. Comfortable with 50% travel. Strong presentation skills and verbal and written communication skills Strong business acumen, bias for action and results orientation.

description: 该职位来源于猎聘  职责描述： Build solid, long-lasting relationships with our client's management. Increasing sales with existing clients. Seeking new clients to achieve current and future budget objectives. Introduction of new products and handling of customer briefs. 任职要求： Proven Sales and Marketing Experience in Fragrance business. The company and our mission:  BridgeU was founded with the belief that talent is equally distributed across the globe, but opportunity is not. We take pride in helping students discover and explore the best pathways available to them - wherever those opportunities may be. We help universities to discover and engage the schools and students that will contribute to their vibrant, diverse and successful programs and courses. In 2020, we believe BridgeU has never been more important to help students, schools and universities discover new opportunities globally and connect at a distance.  Today, BridgeU is the market leading provider of university and careers guidance software to international and globally-minded secondary schools. BridgeU is proud to work with secondary schools in over 300 cities across 119 countries. And, we partner with a growing number of leading universities, currently in 7 countries, to connect recruitment and admissions teams to the largest community of international schools available on one platform. Uniquely, BridgeU combines the culture and pace of a start-up with the support and stability of being part of Kaplan, part of one of the world’s largest and most diverse education providers.  As a Regional Manager (RM), you will be a key member of the Sales team, who are responsible for building and capitalizing on relationships with secondary schools, global education companies, governments, and universities from around the world. The BD team is our engine room for the company’s growth, and you will do this by developing good relationships with potential customers and helping them to see the value our product can bring them.  You will report to a Regional Director (Schools) and will develop relationships with customers in China helping them to understand our product and mission and the value we can provide them. We’re looking for someone who is not phone-shy, takes ownership of their targets and finds inventive ways to contribute to growing the business.  You'll be joining a smart, ambitious team, in an exciting, fast-growth environment. You will be a key hire in China and will have the opportunity to work closely with senior management, and influence how we continue to develop our business in China. . You will also contribute significantly to our marketing plans in China including the development of WeChat. We intend to growth the China business very quickly and we would hope to build the Chinese company around the successful candidate.  Requirements  What you’ll bring: You’re smart, ambitious and motivated by reaching and exceeding new business targets. You’re focused, detail-oriented and adaptable. You’re curious and ready to learn and fully absorb the climate and concerns of the education technology industry. You’re a strong communicator and effective team-player, and you are resilient in times of change You’re excited about the global education problem we’re trying to solve, and at the thought of making a big impact on the business You will speak Mandarin and English You have the ability to sell a compelling vision of a technology platform that’s changing the way in which students plan their futures You’re able to develop a deep understanding of a SaaS product as a key part of your role will be doing demos to customer - not only taking customers through the product features, but empathising and understanding their needs in detail, so you can establish best fit and be a trusted advisor to customers 2 years+ experience as a proven performer in a Sales role, ideally within Edtech/SaaS.  Benefits  What we’ll provide 23,000 RMB/month base salary and up to 40,000 RMB OTE Opportunities for flexible and remote working hours, encouraging everyone to have a healthy work-life balance Annual offsite: we organise a retreat once a year where the whole company gets together Personal development: books, courses and conferences that can help you learn and grow You will most probably be based in the Kaplan Shanghai office (Kaplan is our parent company) Career progression and development Private health insurance Employer’s MPF An open and democratic work culture where everyone can contribute, learn and teach  Equal Opportunities  We are a global team with a global mindset, cherishing and protecting diversity as one of our core values. We are always looking to diversify the talent in our team.  Applications from individuals are encouraged regardless of age, disability, sex, gender reassignment, sexual orientation, pregnancy and maternity, race, religion, belief, marriage or civil partnership. If you feel you don’t quite meet all the criteria in the job spec but have the potential to do the role, we’d still love to hear from you.
industries: Information Technology and Services, Computer Software, and Internet

jobTitle: Sales Operations Coordinator 项目管理专员
description: Job Location: SH & Shenzhen  工作职责: 协助商务团队完成客户的录入流程，准备录入流程所需文件，协调并跟进Salesforce进度; 根据客户需求和商务节奏，制定项目计划，跟进控制项目流程、进度及质量，跟进项目验收和交付等各项工作: 针对内部团队，沟通井协调资源资源，对项目交付过程中的问题主动进行及时跟进与解决; 了解并同时管理多个项目，并按照优先级进行管理，协助完成项目文档的归档和汇总: 协助提升商务团队的管理效率，并完成商务团队的任何其他临时任务;  职位要求: 本科以上学历; 有2年以上项目管理经验，熟悉项目管理工具和方法; 具有开放心态，强Owner意识，和出色的快速学习能力; 具备优秀的团队协调能力，以自标为导向，协助客户和团队沟通和解决问题: 学习能力 及执行力强，富有创新意识，能承受-定的工作压力; 英文读写流利，听说流利者优先考虑;  Please send me your updated resume if you are interested: renee.yang@surrienta.com

Huntsman’s PU Elastomers Division is now searching for a Sales Account Manager at Guangzhou. The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving business on the aggressive growth path, penetrate and expand market share of footwear in PU and TPU, Strengthen stakeholder connection in casual and safety shoes field. This role is an individual contributor.  As The Sales Account Manager, You Will Fully comply with PU elastomer policy and EFUS1ON core value Sales budget fulfillment, manage the business to deliver the budget sales volume / value / contribution margin. Business management to exist and potential customers Well organize customer management and identify new business gain and penetrate into new market to expand FW market share under the guidance of sales manager. Business ownership to drive customer growth up and further move up system goods portfolio to cover unmet needs; Work closely with distributors to retain customer relationship and seek new opportunity, regularly review and manage distributor to generate clearly picture for end users’ business; Support market and brand, OEM to build up pipeline on whole value chain, work with cross functional team such as CS, Finance, production and supply chain to follow up order process and improve service quality. Sales plan and strategy and market development pipeline Strongly capability of sales forecast and plan, aggressively driving volume grow up and CM profitability, market, customer and brand focus Translate global and regional growth strategy into constructing short and long term in order to hit sales target in the top line and fulfillment; Further dig out casual and safety shoe business and map out Desma machine in china army boots and create 3-year capture action plan New project generation and trouble shooting Collaborate with TS team, TD team to dig deeply out replacement market and deliver best-class practice to win market trust and covert into order generation; Independently solve tech complaints with limited support and resource Skills And Experiences Required Chemistry or polymer education background (bachelor’s degree minimum) Basic PU knowledge or FW relative application knowledge, more than 7-10 years working experience in chemical field, possess at least 4 years tech service working is preferred FW industry or shoes industry experience, Global and MNC experience preferred. Proven track record of successful account management and profitable business growth. Able to travel frequently (>60% mainly for domestic travel); Good customer relation skills, able to independently solve problem and handle conflict. Good interpersonal and communication skills to influence team and stakeholder. Integrity and highly commitment High level of passion with strong business acumen, Computer skills, written and spoken English Huntsman offers unsurpassed opportunities to build a successful future. Our diverse portfolio creates a range of career fields including manufacturing, research and development, technical services, sales and marketing, customer service – and the list goes on.  Here, you can make an impact and make a difference. Come join us.  Huntsman is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all qualified applicants for employment, without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, gender identification, sexual orientation and/or expression or any other characteristic protected by law in every location in which we have facilities national or local.  Please refer to https : // www . huntsman . com / privacy / online-privacy-notice for Company’s Data Privacy and Protection information.  All unsolicited resumes presented by recruitment agencies are treated as pro bono information or service.  Huntsman is aware of a scam involving fraudulent job offers. Huntsman does not make job offers until after a candidate has submitted a job application and has participated in a face-to-face interview. Please be advised that emails from Huntsman always end in “@huntsman.com” and that any job offer that requires payment or requires you to deposit a check is likely a scam. If you have questions about any open positions at Huntsman, please visit our Careers website at  http : / /www . huntsman . com / corporate / a / Careers.

Valid driver’s license with a clean driving history and proficient driving skills. 主要职责 保证最佳客户体验：接待所有进店客人，回答问题，热情地为客户和特斯拉粉丝介绍电动汽车的优点,普及电动车知识。 通过良好的沟通，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态，明确特斯拉的发展前景并鼓励顾客试驾，并通过良好的试驾体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友宣传特斯拉。 收集潜在客户，参加市场活动，探索客户购买需求、激发客户需求，配合销售主管完成门店的销售目标。 对现有特斯拉车主提供高质量客户服务。 沟通最新公司讯息，帮助特斯拉爱好者及未来车主更好地了解公司动态。 认真学习了解公司及产品的相关知识，及时了解最新行业发展和最佳实践。 建立良好的客户关系，并在试驾过程中提供完美的客户体验使潜在客户向亲朋好友传递良好特斯拉口碑。 通过公司安排的内部测试，包括但不限于课程培训及测试、驾驶技术测试、店内测试、角色扮演、能力认证、试用期评估等，以达到正式员工的标准和要求。 和外部客户、外部人员，保持清晰、准确、职业、礼貌的沟通, 和内部同事保持良好的沟通和团队协作（包括同部门、跨部门；同门店、跨门店；同地区、跨地区之间）。 保持库存充足和整洁（如适用）。 员工在试用期期间发生的任何职位变更，包括并不限于调岗、晋升等，均不可视为通过试用期，员工需要通过试用期评估。 其他职责：根据业务发展需要，完成管理层指定的其他工作。 职位要求 应届毕业生或1到2年零售、行业销售、以及大客户销售经验或服务经验； 对企业文化高度认可。 出色的沟通能力和客户服务意识。 良好的自我管理能力及自我学习能力，积极热情地参与改变个人交通行业的变革。 深刻理解并传递业务问题和技术概念。 优秀的团队意识，是可靠的团队成员。 能够接受零售业的工作时间，需要晚上和周末工作；有销售经验优先。 持有有效中国驾照，熟练驾驶，且无不良行驶记录。

Together, we can beat cancer.  At Varian, we bring together the world's best talent to realize our vision of a world without fear of cancer. Together, we work passionately to develop and deliver easy-to-use, efficient oncology solutions. If you want to be part of this important mission, we want to hear from you.  Improve market awareness and customer preference, support product development and produce go to market activities.  Apply strategic insight and analytical rigor to drive deep-dive market assessments and business case analyses of new, breakthrough growth opportunities and emerging/disruptive industry trends.  Partner with Sales, marketing and technology leaders across Varian to identify new growth initiatives, particularly in Software, IoT and cloud technologies.  Apply strategic insight and analytical rigor to drive deep-dive market  Build and shape Varian Solutions eco-system with Varian current portfolios and solution assets, including radiation therapy treatment Linacs, planning system, oncology information management system, artificial intelligence treatment planning solutions, oncology data analysis tools, the remote Quality assessment solutions, oncology cloud solutions, etc.  Responsible for identifying and driving future business opportunities for Varian Beijing Innovation Center. This role will focus on long term initiatives to help accelerate the BIC s goal to build our integrated cancer care solutions to benefit our cancer patients and our customers. It will require market opportunity assessments and collaborations/strategic partnerships with organizations in the oncology industry. These initiatives could focus on product integrations with other companies products, bringing new integrated cancer care solutions to market with some partners, or otherwise increasing the value of Varian products/RT institute Center/1st Varian Internet Hospital to our customers across the oncology industry. This role will directly report to BIC Director, launch efforts to expand and build wider range of Varian intelligent cancer care platform and drive the innovation and digital health growth.  In this role, youll be given exposure and the opportunity to contribute cross-functionally with Varian different teams to launch efforts that help Varian realize our mission of a world without fear of cancer. You will be consistently challenged and are expected to learn quickly from your cross-functional teammates as we work to make an impact on cancer care world together.  Fighting cancer calls for big ideas.  We envision a world without fear of cancer. Achieving this vision takes dedication and commitment from all of us, every single day. That's why we celebrate and value the distinctly beautiful and intersectional identities of each of our employees. We are a mirror of our patient-base, which allows us to innovate. Big ideas come from everywhere, and the best ideas are fostered by our unique individual experiences. At Varian, we encourage you to bring your whole self to work and believe your bold and authentic perspective will help to power more victories over cancer.  #TogetherWeFight  Privacy Statement  About Us  Together, we can beat cancer.  Imagine a world without fear of cancer. We do, every day. Varian Medical Systems, a Siemens Healthineers Company, is the world’s leading manufacturer of medical devices and software for treating and managing cancer. For more than 70 years, we have developed, built, and delivered innovative cancer care technologies and solutions for our clinical partners around the globe to help them treat millions of patients each year.  Varian & Siemens Healthineers have united to accelerate our path to further innovation. Taking an Intelligent Cancer Care approach, we are harnessing advanced technologies like artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data analytics to advance cancer treatment and expand access to care to help patients become survivors.  When you join Varian, combined with Siemens Healthineers, you become part of a global network of innovative and inspired minds working together across the globe. We keep the patient and our clinical partners at the center of our thinking as we power new victories in cancer care. Because for cancer patients everywhere, their fight is our fight.  By submitting your interest in this job, you agree to receive text notifications with additional steps to complete your job application. You will receive up to 6 messages from the number "63879". Message & data rates may apply. Please refer to our privacy policy for more information.
industries: Medical Devices, Computer Software, and Hospital & Health Care

The Successful Applicant  Min 5 years work experience for Bachelor degree, min 2-3 years for Master Degree, with successful track record in sales or marketing position of manufacturing industry, preferably for automation-, measurement- or machine equipment. - Knowledge and skill of market research, market analysis, market strategy and market development. - You are fully proficient with MS Office and are experienced in the effective use of a CRM tool. - You are used to intensive travel activity.( Travel rate: >60%)  What's On Offer  A high degree of responsibility - Wide technical and modern environment with interesting challenges - Professional environment with an open communication culture - Great, dynamic work environment - Motivated employees  Contact: Joan Hu  Quote job ref: 4223589

description: Careers that Change Lives  A Day in the Life  Responsibilities may include the following and other duties may be assigned. Promotes and sells Medtronic's products and services within an assigned geographic area and /or specific customer accounts to meet or exceed sales targets. Responsible for developing, building, and strengthening long-term relationships with stakeholders including distributors and healthcare professionals. Responsible for pursuing leads, assessing needs and providing product services to maximize the benefits derived from Medtronic's products and/or services. Promotes and establishes education of the company's products and/or services. Conducts market research including customers and competitors activities. Implements market development plans/strategies and changes as needed. Communicates customer feedback on new products and/or modifications to existing products or applications to internal stakeholders including R&D, Operations and Marketing. Must Have: Minimum Requirements Bachelors degree required Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience and working knowledge of company products and services Nice to Have  About Medtronic  Together, we can change healthcare worldwide. At Medtronic, we push the limits of what technology, therapies and services can do to help alleviate pain, restore health and extend life. We challenge ourselves and each other to make tomorrow better than yesterday. It is what makes this an exciting and rewarding place to be.  We want to accelerate and advance our ability to create meaningful innovations - but we will only succeed with the right people on our team. Let’s work together to address universal healthcare needs and improve patients’ lives. Help us shape the future.  Physical Job Requirements  The physical demands described within the Responsibilities section of this job description are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. For Office Roles: While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to be independently mobile. The employee is also required to interact with a computer, and communicate with peers and co-workers. Contact your manager or local HR to understand the Work Conditions and Physical requirements that may be specific to each role. (ADA-United States of America)  Additional Information Posting Date: May 30, 2021 Travel: No
industries: Medical Devices, Hospital & Health Care, and Pharmaceuticals
