description: Ready to make a difference and impact global business development? This is management consulting with a higher purpose.  Business Sweden is a professional Swedish consulting firm with a global network. We are commissioned by the Swedish government to help Swedish companies grow global sales and international companies invest and expand in Sweden. We currently have more than 500 employees in 50 countries globally. Our office in Shanghai is expanding rapidly and we are looking for a junior colleague who can work to support our senior staff and clients with consultancy assignments.  The job requires strong communication skills, analytical thinking, positive attitude as well as a strong business mindset. Our clients’ expectations on professionalism and business results are very high so for candidates with the right background and focus, we can offer a challenging and rewarding job in an international environment.  This position is for a Chinese citizen based in Shanghai.  Job description Carry out market research that will enable clients to make strategy decisions on how to enter and/or expand in the Chinese market – both from sourcing & manufacturing and from marketing & sales perspective Perform data analysis to identify economic and business trends relevant for Swedish companies Support with analyses of the political and economic environment impacting international firms doing business in China Create impactful presentations to clients’ senior management teams Establish local legal entities for clients Assist with business advice, negotiation, and interpretation in business meetings between Swedish and Chinese companies Work closely together with Chinese and Swedish colleagues, and report to project leaders  Skills & Abilities Excellent communications skills in English, outgoing, sales-oriented and service minded. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities with result-oriented aims. “Hands-on” character, willing to learn and to do the job from start to end of a project. Good at creating clear and impactful presentations and reports. Basic knowledge and understanding of the Chinese market. Experience from a certain field such as for example engineering /mechanical/ automotive; marine; biotech; or consumer/retail is a merit. A team player but with an independent drive, outgoing and eager to learn and improve (high motivation and ambitions). Willingness to travel, both domestically and abroad.  Experience Bachelor’s degree or above in Business, Law or Engineering field preferred. Minimum 2 years working experience, preferably from a Western company. Consulting experience from a well-known consulting firm is a strong merit.  Please apply by sending us a résumé with cover letter in English signed to robin.agne@business-sweden.se

Are you a problem solver and a fast learner? Would you enjoy working in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment? Do you want to be part of a diverse and driven team striving for excellence? If the answer is yes, then keep reading!  Who We Are  Our client is a global platform revolutionizing market research and knowledge sharing across the business community. Their mission is to accelerate the decision-making of our clients by connecting them to the world’s top professionals and industry leaders. They deliver interactions that generate intelligent insights and creative ideas ensuring our clients can drive their business forward efficiently.  The company currently employs 370 professionals in 10 global offices and is rapidly growing as one of the world’s leading global insight platforms to strategy consulting firms, investment houses, and global corporations.  Our Opportunity  As an Associate, you will be researching, engaging, and connecting industry experts with our clients. In order to empower our clients’ business decisions, you are expected to evaluate their specific needs, identify their knowledge gaps, and find the best industry experts. The role is fast-paced and involves communication, recruiting, negotiation, and sales, along with multi-tasking across a variety of running projects. Educate yourself on projects to assess the scope and the needs of the clients Use this knowledge to target and actively recruit relevant experts via phone and email Pitch the company and the value of participating in expert networks Schedule expert interviews for the clients Work in a team to meet project deadlines and exceed clients’ expectations Job requirements  Profiles They Are Seeking  Our client believes in the power of diversity. We are seeking target-driven team players with excellent emotional intelligence, problem-solving and time management skills. 0-3 years of relevant work experience General understanding of business concepts Result oriented, self-driven, and highly motivated to succeed & take on challenges Quick learner and critical thinker with a key focus to add value to our clients Strong communication skills: both written and on the phone Fluency in English and native in Chinese/Japanese/Korean/ Thai/Bahasa/Vietnamese other South East Asian languages Benefits Healthcare Insurance Fast-tracked career growth and opportunities Monthly sponsored company events Internal SWAP program Training and mentorship program

jobTitle: Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , Dalian
description: Work is no longer a place. It’s what you do. And how you do it. More fluid, more flexible, powered by your imagination and by some amazing technology! That’s where we come in. We’re Poly. We’re a global outfitter of pro-grade audio and video technology so that employees everywhere can look and sound their best from anywhere. Join us as we pursue our disruptive vision to bring professional audio and video meeting technology and services to everyone. Be a part of our journey!  As an Inside Sales Channel Account Manager , (ICAM) you will work as part of our APAC Inside Sales Team. You will workwithin a defined geographical territory, (Mainland China) and initiate, own and close sales opportunities on Products and New Service through interacting with a nominated set of Poly Channel Partners , as well as being responsible for the successful on-boarding, development and retention of such Partners.  You will be expected to generate and drive a sufficient pipeline of deals to ensure financial targets are met.  The role requires an active cooperation with multiple departments in Poly and so relationship building, and people skills are essential.  主要职责： 根据公司业务方向，开拓三四级城市渠道 渠道认证：渠道客户的选择、认证； 新产品上市的渠道规划与沟通； 管理负责渠道中 Poly耳机音频和视频业务，完成公司销售目标 完成负责渠道的策略和任务规划 善于利用和整合资源，促进不同团队合作，共同高效完成业绩目标 职位要求： 有一定的 IT 行业渠道销售经验优先 优秀的沟通、协作、谈判能力 勤奋，能够在快节奏的环境中工作和成长 2 年以上相关销售工作经验 全日制本科及以上学历，英语可作为工作语言优先 Our Culture  At Poly, leadership principles aren't just something we talk about, they're something we live and breathe. We believe in creating a work environment where people feel empowered, supported, and included –where trust and transparency are built into the way we work - where creativity, curiosity, and continuous improvement are encouraged and nurtured every day. C3 – Customer. Customer. Customer: Customer obsession is everyone’s job. You enjoy solving customers’ problems - big or small. You work closely with customers, channel partners and their teams to deliver innovative solutions. Raise the Bar: You take pride in your work and know details matter. You know that shavings make a pile. You seek every opportunity to continuously improve teams, products, and processes. Communicate Courageously: You speak with candor but aren't a jerk. You constructively challenge your teammates to get to the best possible outcome or decision. Once a decision is made, you fully align and stay aligned. Onward and Upward: You learn from the past but focus on the future. You rapidly adapt to changes in the marketplace. You help to create solutions that move the company forward with energy, momentum, and results. Own It: You know your business, your customers, and your team – inside and out. You don't sacrifice long-term value for short-term results. You act with integrity, spend money like it’s your own, and put Poly first. Take the Leap: Speed matters in business. You encourage and require those around you to think strategically and act decisively. Poly values calculated risk taking. Ride Together: We are one team. We do what we say we’ll do, we treat each other with respect, we have each other’s back, and we hold each other accountable. Leaders Lead: You know you are part of a larger global community and make decisions as good stewards of the earth, its resources and its people. Our Commitment as an Equal Opportunity Employer  All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity or expression, race, age, religious creed, national origin, physical or mental disability, ancestry, color, marital status, sexual orientation, military or veteran status, status as a victim of domestic violence, sexual assault or stalking, medical condition, genetic information, accessibility needs, or any other protected class or category recognized by applicable equal employment opportunity or other similar laws.  No matter where you’re based, you’ll experience a company that believes that teamwork and collaboration drive maximum impact, seeks well-rounded talent to focused on providing the best customer experience, and understands that this is a marathon, not a sprint. And, top of mind to us is continuously and purposefully building an inclusive culture that empowers all of our team members, across the globe, to do their best work and be the best version of themselves.

Job Title： Hitachi Vantara – Inside Sales Representative (内部/电话销售) Location: Beijing (北京)  What You'll Do 工作范围： You will build direct relationships with customers while working with channel partners to maximize new sales opportunities and renewals within your territory. 您将通过电话和客户及渠道合作伙伴直接建立联系，在您负责的领域内最大限度的开发新销售机会和拓展现有用户新需求。 You will manage all aspects of the full sales cycle to help customers reach their business goals. 您将负责并管理Hitachi Vantara解决方案的销售全流程，帮助客户实现其商业目标。 • You will position and sell the entire Digital Infrastructure portfolio. 您将通过电话的方式销售公司Digital Infrastructure（数字化基础架构）解决方案。 • You will seek to understand our customers’ business challenges and advise on the value derived from our solutions to address their pains. 您将通过电话的方式了解我们客户面临的业务挑战或者需求，并根据公司现有的解决方案给客户提供有价值的建议，帮助客户解决他们的业务挑战/困难。 • You will become a trusted advisor to help our customers with their immediate needs, as well as their long term goals. 成为客户信赖的顾问，满足他们目前的业务需求并帮助他们实现长期目标。 • You will accurately forecast your monthly, quarterly, and annual revenue streams; driving growth in your account base. 准确预测您的每月，季度和年度销售收益， 推动客户增加采购量。 • You will be responsible for driving new business, as well as fostering your account base. 开发更多的新客户，扩充您负责的区域内的客户资源。  Who You Are您是谁： • Goal-oriented and motivated by performance rewards 目标导向，以绩效奖励为动力 • Seek to achieve and exceed annual sales goals 努力实现并超过年度销售目标 • A strong collaborator with internal and external stakeholders 强有力的内部和外部合作者  Skills and Qualifications技能和任职资格： • 3+ years of B2B selling experience in a similar or adjacent industry 3 年以上B2B销售经验在IT行业或者相近行业优先考虑 • Experience owning the full sales cycle (prospecting, validating, negotiating, and closing the sale). 具备全流程销售经验背景 • Highly motivated with a “hunter spirit” to develop new opportunities and grow business 具有开拓者精神，积极开发新的商业机会并实现业务增长 • Demonstrate strong sales achievement (i.e., consistent achievement at or above quota, or a history YoY growth in your target market) 良好的销售业绩 • Passionate about sales and building positive relationships 拥有销售热情并积极拓展客户关系 • Possess strong business acumen and can articulate the value of a solution to address customers’ current and future needs 敏感的商业嗅觉， 清晰阐述Hitachi Vantara解决方案得价值，以解决客户当前或者未来得商业需求 • Engage in active listening to identify customers’ pain and help them derive the value and potential impact of a timely solution 积极倾听客户的痛点并及时给客户提供有价值的潜在解决方案 • Phenomenal communication/presentation skills 较强的沟通/表达能力 • Thrive in a team environment and enjoy sharing ideas and best practices 融入团队，愿意分享知识和最佳实践 • Experience using digital selling tools such as Salesforce and TechTarget 使用过Salesforce and TechTarget 系统优先考虑
